results.title: OM | B520
results.description: Light and nimble, Johan Ansander's new chair presents a generously slender seat supported by minimal construction. An expertly molded piece of plywood turn the hind legs into an accommodating backrest.

results.title: Max | O235
results.description: Max is also soft comfort in generous shape. Johan Ansander has transformed his all-wooden easy-chair Maximus into springy lushness. Max will populate any space, private or public, with a boisterous character almost as if the furniture piece had a life of its own. Johan Ansander has put plenty of time in meticulously crafted seams that result in a happy mimetic attitude.

results.title: Turn | L43
results.description: A solitaire for the home or for the office, a table for the in-between spaces. Use Turn as a side-table for cups, glasses, or books. Or as a pedestal table with flowers or precious art pieces. Use the lowest of three available heights as a sofa table. Or the high one as a worktable for a laptop or tablet.

results.title: BOB Solo
results.description: BOB is coming up with a new offspring in BOB Solo that can be kept close by or left free to roam about independently on its own. Two comfortably padded screens enclose the cubicle's lush seatings and complimentary armrests.

results.title: BOB BIZ
results.description: The BOB family is growing ever more versatile and flexible. The undulating soft openness of BOB, by Stefan Borselius and Thomas Bernstrand, can now be enhanced with BOB Biz to have more private spaces as part of the BOB sofa system.

results.title: BOB Corner
results.description: The BOB sofa system can now make sharp corners thanks to BOB Corner. Every space can't be built with undulating softness; sometimes a break is needed to make any kind of seating arrangement perfect.

results.title: OM | B520
results.description: Light and nimble, Johan Ansander's new chair presents a generously slender seat supported by minimal construction. An expertly molded piece of plywood turn the hind legs into an accommodating backrest.

results.title: Honken X46 | O131
results.description: Honken has a new offspring in X40 and X46, a generous easy chair in two different heights for restaurants, conference-rooms, as well as at home.

results.title: Momang | O220
results.description: Two long pieces for back legs, another pair for the front, and another six for cross and seat rails. All of it out of a 4.4 meter long piece of wood. What more do you need for a sturdy and comfy café seating?

results.title: Still Life Stack | B511
results.description: Marcel Sigel offer a unique chair all in wood thanks to an iconic twist to the backrest. Although the ash veneered birch wood is bent to the extremes at the ends, the wood seems to flow effortlessly like a strip of cloth. Or rather a piece of cloth frozen in time!

results.title: Still Life | B510
results.description: Marcel Sigel offer a unique chair all in wood thanks to an iconic twist to the backrest. Although the ash veneered birch wood is bent to the extremes at the ends, the wood seems to flow effortlessly like a strip of cloth. Or rather a piece of cloth frozen in time!

results.title: Poppe | O161HA
results.description: Stefan Borselius + Bernstrand & Lindau 2015/2016Poppe is a neat and comfortable easy chair that with its exact sitting angle and thinnest possible shell is shaped as the narrowest possible easy chair. In the public room there isn't always space for large easy chairs but there will always be space for a Poppe! Poppe is available with a swivel or four legged frame.

results.title: Bobby | S821
results.description: Bobby’s backrest has been perfected by Stefan Borselius and Thomas Bernstrand so that the BOB family’s younger brother is now a little more grown up. Still as boisterous before, Bobby can easily assemble himself into a slender sofa in tight spaces, but might immediately disengage himself to gather around tables or to stand all by himself.

results.title: Röhsska | O190
results.description: Carpenter and artist and designer Fredrik Paulsen is the latest addition to our team of designers. The Röhsska chair was named after the leading Swedish design museum that will reopen in 2019. Röhsska meets artisanry in industrial production and of course, the chair has been produced in Sweden, with Swedish wages and the design following Swedish sustainability ideals. The frame construction in 150 year-old beech from Skåne is complemented by a seat and backrest made from Swedish pine plywood making the chair homegrown in every sense of the word.

results.title: GAP 4 | 0182
results.description: GAP 4 - Probably the most comfortable shell chair in the world! Let us present the development of the Award winning GAP product family, now as a four-legged shell chair GAP 4.

results.title: GAP 4 | 0182G
results.description: GAP 4 - Probably the most comfortable shell chair in the world! Let us present the development of the Award winning GAP product family, now as a four-legged shell chair GAP 4.

results.title: Lucky | B17
results.description: A chair in form-pressed wood veneer, as simple and self-evident in its expression as if it has always existed, and yet completely new and never seen before.

results.title: Dundra 4 | S76A
results.description: Stefan Borselius has designed the Dundra seating series that is constructed around a chromed steel frame with upholstered moulded seats. The covered button that is one of the hallmarks of this family of furnishings helps ensure that the backrest retains its intended shape. Dundra chair is a great choice in, for example, restaurants, hotels and libraries.

results.title: Sparta | B15
results.description: Sparta is something unusual; a comfortable folding chair that functions well – both folded and unfolded. Sparta only measures 27 mm when folded, that makes 100 chairs in 2.7 m! Sparta is perfect for short stay seating and with its strong design profile it is as beautiful in use as when not in use. Sparta can be stored by either hanging on a wall, placed in a trolley or in a floor rack. Sparta has a reversible seat. Sparta is available with a wall hook and a trolley for 26 chairs.

results.title: Dent | B502
results.description: How can you 3D-form an ordinary veneer? Dent made the impossible possible. The Dent chair challenges the idea of the sleek and beautiful. Despite its dented surface is the chair Dent a comfortable shell chair with many uses.

results.title: Dent Stack | B501
results.description: How can you 3D-form an ordinary veneer? Dent made the impossible possible. The Dent chair challenges the idea of the sleek and beautiful. Despite its dented surface is the chair Dent a comfortable shell chair with many uses.

results.title: Dent Wood | B504
results.description: How can you 3D-form an ordinary veneer? Dent made the impossible possible. The Dent chair challenges the idea of the sleek and beautiful. Despite its dented surface is the chair Dent a comfortable shell chair with many uses.

results.title: Dent Stack | B501D
results.description: The chair Dent with a “dressed” seat shell. The dented chair Dent, who despite its three-dimensional surface is made entirely with ordinary veneer, is now available in an upholstered version. Soft and comfortable to sit on and interesting in its expression.

results.title: Dent | B502D
results.description: The chair Dent with a “dressed” seat shell. The dented chair Dent, who despite its three-dimensional surface is made entirely with ordinary veneer, is now available in an upholstered version. Soft and comfortable to sit on and interesting in its expression.

results.description: The chair Dent with a “dressed” seat shell. The dented chair Dent, who despite its three-dimensional surface is made entirely with ordinary veneer, is now available in an upholstered version. Soft and comfortable to sit on and interesting in its expression.

results.title: Sting | O30
results.description: Sting is back! Made in just two materials: aluminum and stainless steel. At home indoors as well as outdoor. Sting has that perfect tilt of the backrest. Now Fredrik Mattson and Stefan Borselius’ stackable and linkable chair is back in business with the same exact profile and its very precise graphic language.

results.title: Sting | O30A
results.description: Sting is back! Made in just two materials: aluminum and stainless steel. At home indoors as well as outdoor. Sting has that perfect tilt of the backrest. Now Fredrik Mattson and Stefan Borselius’ stackable and linkable chair is back in business with the same exact profile and its very precise graphic language.

results.title: Superstraw | S25N
results.description: In 2010 we revolutionized tubular steel furniture with our introduction of the Straw chair. 2013 Straw’s big brother Superkink arrived on the scene and 2015 came the new sibling Superstraw. What makes Superstraw unique is the way in which the tubular steel has been deformed. Instead of forming the frame in gentle bends, the designers Osko + Deichmann have folded the steel tubes.

results.title: WILMER | O59C
results.description: Wilmer is an easy chair with soft lines for the modern life. A comfortable upholstered conference chair or a neat little easy chair depending on the context in which it is used. Wilmer C is a symmetrical further development of the asymmetric chair Wilmer S.

results.title: WILMER | O58CT
results.description: Wilmer is a multi-functional easy chair for the modern life. An easy chair with soft lines and high functionality. The differences between past, present and future, work and play, here and there, have been erased, and multitasking is the order of the day. Wilmer CT is a symmetrical further development of the asymmetric chair Wilmer T.

results.title: WILMER | O55S
results.description: Wilmer S is a multi-functional easy chair for the modern life. An asymmetric easy chair with soft lines and high functionality. With a raised armrest – a thinking side – that helps you relax.

results.title: WILMER | O56T
results.description: Wilmer is a multi-functional easy chair for the modern life. An asymmetric easy chair with soft lines and high functionality. The differences between past, present and future, work and play, here and there, have been erased, and multitasking is the order of the day – especially for the younger generation.

results.title: WILMER | O57CS
results.description: Wilmer is an easy chair with soft lines for the modern life. A comfortable upholstered conference chair or a neat little easy chair depending on the context in which it is used. Wilmer C is a symmetrical further development of the asymmetric chair Wilmer S.

results.title: WILMER | O55TS
results.description: Wilmer is a multi-functional easy chair for the modern life. An asymmetric easy chair with soft lines and high functionality. The differences between past, present and future, work and play, here and there, have been erased, and multitasking is the order of the day – especially for the younger generation.

results.title: Innovation C | O70
results.description: Innovation C is now dressed up all monochrome for its 20-year anniversary! Using a tablet, a laptop or whatever electronic device simplifies the working environment, the workplace not confined to a desk but possible everywhere. New ways of working demanding new furniture typologies. Fredrik Mattson’s Innovation C was almost a big question mark shaped as poignant graphic icon: how can it be used? Is the arm a backrest or a little table? But sure, it is both!

results.title: Beplus | B+
results.description: Beplus is a folding chair/stool with frame in steel and back and seat in birch. Beplus is perfect for short stay seating and with its strong design profile it is as beautiful in use as when not in use. Beplus can be stored by either hanging on a wall, placed in a trolley or in a floor rack. In 1987 Beplus was awarded with Forsnäspriset, Excellent Swedish Design and Forum Närmiljö:s Möbelpris.

results.title: Kaffe | O11
results.description: Kaffe chair is equally at home indoors and out. It is built to withstand outdoor environments that demand a great deal in terms of durability, but is also an ideal choice indoors. The “well-used” look of the seat creates a cosy, comfortable impression. Design-wise, Kaffe is a more formal take on the classic café chair; its straightforward, elemental lines are matched by the naturalness of the colours – grey and black. The Kaffe family comprises chair, sofa and table.

results.title: Boo | O48
results.description: Boo is a stackable chair with a seat shell of formfelt, fabric or leather laminated on the inside. Boo is suitable for a variety of interiors, for example conference rooms, meeting-rooms, canteens and libraries. Because of the special characteristics of the formfelt, the seat of Boo is sound absorbing. The chair is lightweight thanks to the choice of material and construction.

results.title: B4-47
results.description: B4-47 is a stackable chair in birch and steel. The seat can be stained and the legs are available in black lacquered steel or stainless steel. B4-47 can among other interiors be used in canteens and cafés. B4 is available in seat height 47, 65 and 82 cm.

results.title: Maximus | O230
results.description: Light and soft, and like it's sketched as a comic strip furniture piece, but made out of heavy duty massive ash. Maximus is a playful departure from angular and rational furniture with a mimetic attitude reminiscent of Keith Haring.

results.title: BOB 52 | Easy Chair
results.description: BOB 52 is twice as much BOB, added to the seating system that you already love!

results.title: Big Talk | O77
results.description: Adam Goodrum participated with a vibrant showy lounge chair at Febrik and Kvadrat’s exhibitionKnit project!during 3 Days of Design in Copenhagen. Without further ado, the product landed in Åhus and became Big Talk, one of the highlights in Blå Station’s 2021 design surprises.

results.title: Honken X40 | O130
results.description: Honken has a new offspring in X40 and X46, a generous easy chair in two different heights for restaurants, conference-rooms, as well as at home.

results.title: BOB | S80 | Easy chair
results.description: A sofa system providing almost unlimited options, constructed using the smallest possible number of modules. Where ordinary sofas are usually rectangular, square and predictable, Bob offers the architectonic freedom to either challenge or adhere to all types of spaces.

results.title: Jackson | O720
results.description: An easy chair that will fit everywhere? Stefan Borselius and Thomas Bernstrand jumped at the brief. Jackson can live all by itself or gathering together in small and large groups. At a table, along a wall or completely on its own. Jackson is sometimes right in the middle enjoying the company, or he is that little uninvited one crashing in everywhere.

results.title: Park+ | S90
results.description: Some furniture wants to get out in the sun. Ironically, Park+ does the very opposite by bringing the outdoors indoors. Chat with friends, read a magazine, work on your laptop... all with the same easy-going freedom as on a park bench.

results.title: Pinzo | O210
results.description: Pinzo is a raw-hewn, sturdy little punk of a chair. Stubby and with a springy inclination, and offers an almost brutal simplicity of construction, with a finger jointed backrest and a hole as a little handle in the lower part of the seat.

results.title: Lucky Lounge | B18
results.description: Lucky has grown even more comfy with the new lounge version. The accentuated horizontal and vertical forms of its sibling are retained along with its generous and spacious proportions.

results.title: Åhus | B31
results.description: Åhus is a comfortable, compact easy chair with a balance between the modern and the timeless. Compatible with both contemporary and historical settings. Åhus has no redundant or unnecessary elements but is even so an easy chair with character. By integrating a functional side tables, it gives a sense of asymmetry.

results.title: Åhus | B30
results.description: Åhus is a comfortable, compact easy chair with a balance between the modern and the timeless. Compatible with both contemporary and historical settings. Åhus is an easy chair with character without unnecessary elements. By integrating a functional side table in the armrest the sight is slightly asymmetrical.

results.title: Pocket | O66
results.description: Tote bags, backpacks, scarfs, satchels, jackets, sling bags, clutches, laptop sleeves... Too many things to keep track of while out-and-about in town?

results.title: Dent Lounge | B505D
results.description: From a distance, the new Dent easy chair looks like it’s sculpted in clay. When you sit on it, it’s all soft, enveloping leather. The new addition to the Dent family by o4i (office for ideas), keeps the original three-dimensional surface in ordinary veneer, but now with a large generous ”dressed” seat shell fixed on a swivel frame.

results.title: Dundra High Back | S75
results.description: The Dundra family just couldn’t do without another, even more stylish easy chair. The high backrest ensures relaxed comfort, and the swivel cross-frame allows for movement even when resting your legs on the footstool. Stefan Borselius has once again produced a contemporary, almost classic feeling, with the covered button as his distinct hallmark. The high backrest welcomes the short and the tall without compromise, and full head support allows both relaxation and reading.

results.title: Superkink | S26
results.description: In 2010 we revolutionized tubular steel furniture with our introduction of Straw chair. 2013 Straw’s big brother arrived on the scene! Like all older brothers, Superkink is bigger, stronger, full of self-confidence and will do anything to defend his siblings. What makes Superkink unique is the way in which the tubular steel has been deformed. Instead of forming the frame in gentle bends, the designers Osko + Deichmann have folded the steel tubes.

results.title: Poppe Swivel | O163HA
results.description: Poppe is a neat and comfortable easy chair that with its exact sitting angle and thinnest possible shell is shaped as the narrowest possible easy chair. In the public room there isn't always space for large easy chairs but there will always be space for a Poppe! Poppe is available with a swivel or four legged frame.

results.title: Koja | S51H
results.description: Koja High is an easy chair with a protective shell of ash wood. An upholstered upper part and down-filled cushions make the high Koja a perfect place to relax or seclude yourself from the noisy surroundings. Koja is suitable for hotel lobbys, lounge areas and libraries, among many other locations. Koja also comes in a low version and is also available as a sofa with high and low backrest.

results.title: Bubble | L290
results.description: Bubble is no longer a part of our regular product range and is only available for projects. Please contact us for more information.

results.title: Koja | S51L
results.description: Koja Low is an easy chair with a protective shell of ash wood. An upholstered upper part and down-filled cushions make Koja a perfect place to relax. results.title: Innovation C | O70
results.description: Innovation C is now dressed up all monochrome for its 20-year anniversary! Using a tablet, a laptop or whatever electronic device simplifies the working environment, the workplace not confined to a desk but possible everywhere. New ways of working demanding new furniture typologies. Fredrik Mattson’s Innovation C was almost a big question mark shaped as poignant graphic icon: how can it be used? Is the arm a backrest or a little table? But sure, it is both!

results.title: B25
results.description: Blå Station was 25 years young in 2011, and Cate & Nelson were commissioned to design a product to commemorate the occasion – B25. Their brief was to base this product on the language of design that characterised Blå Station in its earliest days – the round birch-wood ring and natural tanned leather from Tärnsjö Tannery.

results.title: Qvarto | S10M
results.description: Qvarto can be used free standing as an easy chair or linked with other menbers of the Qvarto family, becoming a sofa. Qvarto can be used in many different locations; waiting areas, universities, hotels and many more.

results.title: Hövding | B8L
results.description: Hövding B8L is a swivel chair with seat and backrest in birch, and underframe in steel. Hövding is available in many different configurations. Among other interiors Hövding can be used in libraries, waiting-rooms and hotel lobbys. Hövding is available with a high or low backrest.

results.title: Hövding | B8M
results.description: Hövding is a swivel chair with seat and backrest in birch and underframe in steel. Hövding is available in many different configurations. Among other interiors Hövding can be used in libraries, waiting-rooms and hotel lobbys. Hövding is available with a high or low backrest.

results.title: RUT | S61
results.description: Meet RUT, a square sofa system. Each module is 75 x 75 centimeters. Causal and inviting. Or sober and formal. RUT seems like a well-known acquaintance but is a brand new companion. Opt for a laid-back space in one direction: perfect for reading a book, surfing the net, watching a movie, chatting with friends. RUT is all flexibility and will favor slowness and lingering comfort as well as allow for temporary seating.

results.title: Park+ | S90
results.description: Some furniture wants to get out in the sun. Ironically, Park+ does the very opposite by bringing the outdoors indoors. Chat with friends, read a magazine, work on your laptop... all with the same easy-going freedom as on a park bench.

results.title: Prinsessan | B640
results.description: Blå Station has found yet another master student at Konstfack, the University of Arts, Crafts and Design in Stockholm. The Princess won the design competition at the municipality of Karlshamn on the theme a bench for interior public spaces.

results.title: BOB | S80 | Pouffe
results.description: A sofa system providing almost unlimited options, constructed using the smallest possible number of modules. Where ordinary sofas are usually rectangular, square and predictable, Bob offers the architectonic freedom to either challenge or adhere to all types of spaces.

results.title: Ping-Pong Bench | L231

results.title: Polstergeist | S20-00
results.description: The Polstergeist sofa system provides possibilities of none, one or two backrests. The backrests can also be placed in a tête à tête position. results.title: BOB Corner

results.title: BOB Solo
results.description: BOB is coming up with a new offspring in BOB Solo that can be kept close by or left free to roam about independently on its own. Two comfortably padded screens enclose the cubicle's lush seatings and complimentary armrests.

results.title: Turn | L43
results.description: A solitaire for the home or for the office, a table for the in-between spaces. Use Turn as a side-table for cups, glasses, or books. Or as a pedestal table with flowers or precious art pieces. Use the lowest of three available heights as a sofa table. Or the high one as a worktable for a laptop or tablet.

results.title: LIV | L380
results.description: Is it an abstract sculpture? A mimetic design resembling a face? Or is it just a little table? Ola Giertz's LIV is all of it in an imaginative composition in perfect balance. A clear-cut graphic design with a strong character beyond mere functionality. Place LIV at a sofa, by a desk, or freestanding all alone or in company with its peers.

results.title: Jack | L400
results.description: Jack will multiply any wall outlet. Just connect Jack, and you will have USB- as well as standard electric connections on the cone-formed base of the table. Jack can connect to BOB, which offer elements with electric outlets, or can be used as a freestanding table.

results.title: Jackless Wood | L405
results.description: Jackless has been reincarnated all in wood, a small technological feat without precedence. Never before has a cone this big been made in wood with such perfect form and without almost any waste of material.

Gaia gives the room the best sound quality while creating a colorful and inspiring ambient.

results.title: Ginkgo | A40

Ginkgo can be a cloudy sky in winter or a forest ablaze with colour during the autumn. Merely by changing the colours, this simple shape can bring different inspirational landscapes into your indoor environment. Ginkgo reduce ambient noise and echoes in the room.

results.title: BOB Light | D840
results.description: Obviously BOB needs a lamp, and this high overhead light meticulously follows BOB´s contours and is mounted on the backrest. Alongside BOB Job at the Stockholm Furniture Fair we will be launching Bob Light in collaboration with Zero, a space-shaping lighting solution that can be integrated directly into the BOB backrest. The dimmable LED lamp nested behind the convex diffuser can be pivoted to create intimate and focused lighting. It is also available as a freestanding floor lamp and pendant. All three designs created for our modular sofa system BOB are available from Blå Station and the freestanding floor lamp and pendant can be purchased from Zero directly

results.title: BOB JOB | S80

results.title: BOB Home | S80

Choose from straight sofas of varying lengths and corner sofas – or why not go for a generous armchair? Morris Jr takes its inspiration from an original from the 1960's with the name Morris, designed by Lindau & Lindekrantz. Morris Jr works with mobility in a natural interplay with the user and makes it easy to refurnish the room according to their own needs and functions. With castors on the furniture you also save a few backs.

Please contact us for more information.Pebble is a sofa and easy chair- range that could provide both calm and an opportunity to recharge – right in the midst of a hectic life. As the name indicates the range is inspired by rocks and stones, because of their size, strength and unchangeable qualities, they symbolize harmony. Pebble comes an easy chair, a 2-seater sofa and a 3-Seater sofa, which can as well be used as a daybed extra bed when you have night guests. The easy chair can be accompanied by a footstool.In their studio the designers noticed a small, beautifully rounded pebble. It was dark grey, very smooth and had a neat white line running across it. The line as a graphic element, together with the pebble’s pleasant form and texture, became the base for the design in PEBBLE. They also added a functional ornament, the wire frame enclosing the sofa and holding the loose cushions in place, to create an interesting line pattern often found on stones. Pebble was shown as a prototype for the first time at Salone Satelite on Salone del Mobile Fair in Milano in 2005.

Vår populäraste hylla! Används mestadels i kapprum till de mindre barnen för att hålla ordning på sina kläder.

results.description: Stövelhängare som finns i flera olika bredder.

results.description: Finns i höjderna 350 och 700mm. Kan förses med tillbehör som stövelkrokar, klädkrokar, hängknoppar m.m. Se tillbehör.

results.title: Mama klädkrok
results.description: Jonas Bergfeldts krok Mama är en själfull krok som med öppna armar ger ett varmt välkomnande. Mama har tilldelats designpriset »Utmärkt Svensk Form« och har flera gånger uppmärksammats i internationella utställningar. Mama kroken är den lysande stjärnan i vår krokfamilj och passar i de flesta miljöer.

results.title: Gloria klädkrok
results.description: När Joel Karlsson fick i uppdrag att ta fram en ny krok funderade han kring hur man kunde komplettera den traditionella kroken så att plagg utan hank slipper »krokmärken« i nacken. »Vi ville skapa en produkt som ›förlåter‹ plagget på samma sätt som galgen gör« säger Karlsson om sin nyskapande krok som försetts med en gloria. Gloria kroken är våran krok som är mest funktionell och kan ersätta en hatthylla där hallen inte ger utrymme för någon stor möbel. Du kan hänga flera jackor på den, lägga handskarna och mössan bakom samt använda en galge för upphängning.

results.title: Papa klädkrok
results.description: Med kroken Papa har formgivaren Stefan Borselius försett Essem Designs sortiment med en robust hängare. Krokens kraftiga fundament och långa arm ger ett unikt utseende och möjliggör att flera plagg kan hängas på varandra. Funkar alldeles utmärkt tillsammans med en galge och ger ett väldigt fint uttryck när man placerar flera på rad.

results.title: Skolkrok enkel
results.description: Krok 1021 är en enkel traditionell skolkrok tillverkad i stål.

results.title: Skolkrok dubbel
results.description: Krok 1040 är en dubbel traditionell skolkrok tillverkad i stål.

results.title: Krok 142
results.description: Krok 142 även känd som bläckfiskkroken är en nätt och praktisk krok som passar i de flesta utrymmen. Kroken är tillverkad i gjuten aluminium. Standardfärg är kulpolerad aluminium, vit och svart struktur.

results.title: Point singelkrok
results.description: Formgivaren Anders Hjelm har ritat kroken Point som hämtar sitt uttryck från den japanska papperskonsten origami. Krokens enkla konstruktion ger den ett unikt uttryck och kommer i tre utföranden – som singel, dubbel eller kvadrupel. Sedan finns den även som nyckelhållare.

results.title: Point dubbelkrok
results.description: Formgivaren Anders Hjelm har ritat kroken Point som hämtar sitt uttryck från den japanska papperskonsten origami. Krokens enkla konstruktion ger den ett unikt uttryck och kommer i tre utföranden – som singel, dubbel eller kvadrupel. Sedan finns den även som nyckelhållare.

results.title: Point kvadrupelkrok
results.description: Formgivaren Anders Hjelm har ritat kroken Point som hämtar sitt uttryck från den japanska papperskonsten origami. Krokens enkla konstruktion ger den ett unikt uttryck och kommer i tre utföranden – som singel, dubbel eller kvadrupel. Sedan finns den även som nyckelhållare.

results.title: Ankarkrok 140 2-pack
results.description: Ankarkrok 140 har ett plant fäste som passar under plana ytor. Kroken är tillverkad i gjuten aluminium.

results.title: Tamburin kroklist
results.description: Designern Andreas Klippinge fann inspiration för Tamburin kroklisten i något så oväntat som djurriket. Delfiner blev inspirationen för kroklisten. Infälld sticker kroken upp ovanför trälisten som ryggfenan på en lekfull delfin korsar vattenytan. Kontrasten mellan den precisa tekniken och den enkla mekaniska rörelsen hämtas från flipperspel. Liksom dessa är det svårt att hålla fingrarna borta, man vill nästan fälla ut en krok även om man inte behöver hänga upp något för stunden.

results.title: Nostalgi kroklist
results.description: Nostalgi kroklist har sitt ursprung från vår klassiska hatthylla Nostalgi formgiven av Gunnar Bolin. Konsolerna tillverkas av återvunnen aluminium som förenas av rundstav i trä, metall och aluminium. Rundstaven kommer i längden en meter, men kan kapas efter önskad längd. Dessutom kan Nostalgi förlängas med hjälp av en påbyggnadsdel innehållande; mellankonsol, rundstav och ankarkrokar och på så sätt bli hur lång som helst. På varje del sitter fem stycken ankarkrokar pressgjutna i återvunnen aluminium. De metaller som inte är behandlade som aluminium, mässing och koppar kommer i sitt råa utförande vilket kan ge variation från detalj till detalj. Trä är också ett material som kan variera i utseende och krokarna har ett glansigare utseende än konsolerna i utförandet aluminium.

results.title: Gustav kroklist
results.description: En enkel kroklist för mindre utrymmen. Rör i metall eller rundstav i trä. Vägg- fästena och krokarna är tillverkade i aluminium med knopp i trä. Gustav kom till för att ta tillvara på spillet från kapade rundstavar till Nostalgihyllan.

results.title: Dekorativ kroklist Maxi 4
results.description: Dekorativ sattes i produktion redan på 60-talet. Designad av Gunnar Bolin med inspiration från en liknande kroklist som han såg hemma hos sin svärmor. Genom årtiondena har den varit populär på grund av dess robusthet och praktiska egenskaper men framförallt för att den passar bra i mindre utrymmen. För tjugo år sedan togs Dekorativ ur produktion men på senare år har efterfrågan ökat på grund av kundernas jakt efter smart förvaring. Dekorativ är tillverkad i Anderstorp med ram i lackat massivt trä i olika färger och gjutna krokar i mässing.

results.title: Kroklist 1
results.description: Klassik kroklist med "skolkrokar". Tillverkad av klarlackerad bok, björk, furu eller ek samt i vitlackerat utförande. Finns i flera olika längder, 75 mm in till första kroken och 150 mm c/c mellan krokarna. OBS! Bilden ovan visar hur kroklisten ser ut i bredd 1050 mm. Det som skiljer från bredd till bredd är antal krokar. Till projekt kan vi leverera denna i andra bredder. Hör av er till oss för offert och mer information.

results.title: Kroklist 2
results.description: Klassisk kroklist med "skolkrokar". Tillverkad av klarlackerad bok, björk, furu eller ek samt i vitlackerat utförande. Finns i flera olika längder, 75 mm in till första kroken och 150 mm c/c mellan krokarna. OBS! Bilden ovan visar hur kroklisten ser ut i bredd 1050 mm. Det som skiljer från bredd till bredd är antal krokar. Till projekt kan vi leverera denna i andra bredder. Hör av er till oss för offert och mer information.

results.title: Nostalgi hatt-/skohylla
results.description: Hatthyllan och skohyllan Nostalgi ritades 1937 av Gunnar Bolin. Hyllan har kommit och gått genom decennierna, men ses idag som en klassiker i svensk möbelhistoria. Konsolerna tillverkas av återvunnen aluminium som förenas av rundstav i bl.a. trä och aluminium. Rundstaven kommer i längden en meter, men kan kapas efter önskad längd. Dessutom kan Nostalgi förlängas med hjälp av en påbyggnadsdel innehållande; mellankonsol, rundstavar och ankarkrokar och på så sätt bli hur lång som helst. På varje del sitter tre stycken ankarkrokar pressgjutna i återvunnen aluminium. De metaller som inte är behandlade som aluminium, mässing och koppar kommer i sitt råa utförande vilket kan ge variation från detalj till detalj. Trä är också ett material som kan variera i utseende och krokarna har ett glansigare utseende än konsolerna i utförandet aluminium.

results.title: Nostalgi 291 hatthylla
results.description: Hatthyllan Nostalgi 291 togs fram redan på 40-talet. Den blev ett uppskattat alternativ till den klassiska föregångaren Nostalgi, eftersom en hel del förfrågningar om en djupare hatthylla med ett större utrymme för galgar hade trillat in. Åttio år senare återupptas nu “291:an” i produktion med en förbättrad design. Hyllan passar utmärkt till Nostalgi skohylla och är perfekt för den som letar efter en djupare hylla med galgstång men som fortfarande vill ha en enkel och klassisk design och karaktär.

results.title: Funk Hatthylla
results.description: Hyllan Funk är tillverkad av rostfritt stål med rundstav i ek. Formgiven av Mats Theselius på 90-talet men först nu förfinad och satt i produktion. En elegant och stabil hatthylla som genomsyrar kvalité. Till projekt kan vi leverera denna i andra bredder (1830 mm, 2440 mm). För varje bredd tillkommer en konsol. Hör av er till oss för offert och mer information.

results.title: Funk Skohylla
results.description: Fristående skohyllan Funk är tillverkad av rostfritt stål och designad för att passa med hatthyllan Funk. Formgiven av Mats Theselius på 90-talet men först nu förfinad och satt i produktion. En ren och stabil skohylla som genomsyrar kvalité, den har ett fyndigt överhyllplan och en praktisk avtagbar dropplåt. Till projekt kan vi leverera denna i andra bredder (1830 mm, 2440 mm). För varje bredd tillkommer en konsol. Hör av er till oss för offert och mer information.

results.title: Classic hatthylla
results.description: I slutet av 1950-talet ritade Gunnar Bolin hatthyllan Classic. Dess runda former bröt ny mark och har skonat många huvuden från vassa kanter. En mycket funktionell och hållbar hatthylla som är mycket flexibel i vilka bredder som går att få till din hall. Har en retrokaraktär men passar i många olika hallmiljöer. Till projekt kan vi leverera denna hatthylla monterad och även i längder över 1200 mm. Kontakta oss för offert.

results.title: Classic skohylla
results.description: I slutet av 50-talet designade Gunnar Bolin skohyllan Classic. Dess runda former bröt ny mark och skonade många ben från vassa kanter. En mycket funktionell och hållbar skohylla som är mycket flexibel med olika bredder för att passa din hall. Har en retro look men passar i många olika hallmiljöer.

results.title: Tamburin skohylla
results.description: Produktfamiljen Tamburin kom till i Andreas Klippinges målsättning att rita något “superfunktionellt”. Valet föll på den fristående skohyllan viktig för svenska hem och helt oumbärlig då skandinaviskt klimat med årstidernas stora växlingar, ställer höga krav på hallens prestanda. Tamburin skohylla består av pulverlackerade stålgavlar i kombination med klarlackade ekrundstavar. Gavelns vinkel avslöjar Tamburins karaktär av ändamålsenlig enkelhet, konstruktionens precision och materialens höga kvalité. Trots dess nätta yttre är hallmöbelserien Tamburin robust. Fristående och robust skohylla som kommer monterad.

results.title: Tamburin hatthylla
results.description: Produktfamiljen Tamburin kom till i Andreas Klippinges målsättning att rita något “superfunktionellt”. Valet föll på hatthyllan, viktig för svenska hem och helt oumbärlig då skandinaviskt klimat med årstidernas stora växlingar, ställer höga krav på hallens prestanda. Tamburin hatthylla består av pulverlackerade stålgavlar och krokar i kombination med klarlackade ekrundstavar. Gavelns vinkel avslöjar Tamburins karaktär av ändamålsenlig enkelhet, konstruktionens precision och materialens höga kvalité. Trots dess nätta yttre är hallmöbelserien Tamburin robust. Till hatthyllan bredd 1000 mm ingår det 4 enkelkrokar och 3 dubbelkrokar samt till bredd 600 mm 3 enkelkrokar och 2 dubbelkrokar. En rymlig och funktionell hatthylla som kommer monterad.

results.title: Classic hatthylla enkel
results.description: I slutet av 1950-talet ritade Gunnar Bolin hatthyllan Classic. Dess runda former bröt ny mark och har skonat många huvuden från vassa kanter. En mycket funktionell och hållbar hatthylla som är mycket flexibel i vilka bredder som går att få till din hall. Har en retrokaraktär men passar i många olika hallmiljöer. Här hittar du den med endast ett hyllplan. OBS! Bilden ovan visar hur hatthyllan ser ut i bredd 1000 mm. Det som skiljer från bredd till bredd är antal krokar.

results.title: Classic skohylla enkel
results.description: I slutet av 50-talet designade Gunnar Bolin skohyllan Classic. Dess runda former bröt ny mark och skonade många ben från vassa kanter. Här hittar du den med endast ett hyllplan. OBS! Bilden ovan visar hur skohyllan ser ut i bredd 1000 mm.

results.title: Emelie skohylla
results.description: Emelie skohylla är en nätt och funktionell skohylla som finns i flera bredder för att passa många utrymmen där bra skoförvaring krävs. OBS! Bilden ovan visar hur skohyllan ser ut i bredd 1000 mm.

results.title: Point keyholder
results.description: Formgivaren Anders Hjelm har ritat kroken Point som hämtar sitt uttryck från den japanska papperskonsten origami. Krokens enkla konstruktion ger den ett unikt uttryck och kommer i tre utföranden – som singel, dubbel eller kvadrupel. Här ser vi den som nyckelhållare.

results.title: Anna hatthylla
results.description: En robust och välgjord hatthylla som hämtar sitt uttryck från Classic-modellen, men som istället för stålrör använder formpressat trä; bok, björk och ek i konsolerna. Finns som hatt- och skohylla. OBS! Bilden ovan visar hur hatthyllan ser ut i bredd 1000 mm. Det som skiljer från bredd till bredd är antal krokar. Tänk på att trä är ett levande material, färgen kan variera lite från bilderna.

results.title: Anna skohylla
results.description: En robust och välgjord skohylla som hämtar sitt uttryck från Classic-modellen, men som istället för stålrör använder formpressat trä; bok, björk och ek i konsolerna. Finns som hatt- och skohylla. OBS! Bilden ovan visar hur skohyllan ser ut i bredd 1000 mm. Tänk på att trä är ett levande material, färgen kan variera lite från bilderna.

results.title: Sara hatthylla
results.description: Hatthylla med hyllplan av klarlackerade träribbor i furu, bok, björk, ek samt i svart eller vitt med fasade kanter på översidan. Galgrör och krokrör av Ø 19 mm blankförkromade stålrör. Krokar av blankförnicklad mässing. konsoler lackerade i vit och svart färg som standard. OBS! Bilden ovan visar hur hatthyllan ser ut i bredd 1000 mm. Det som skiljer från bredd till bredd är antal krokar.

results.title: Sara skohylla vägghängd
results.description: Skohylla med hyllplan av klarlackerade träribbor i furu, bok, björk, ek samt i svart eller vitt med fasade kanter på översidan. konsoler lackerade i vit och svart färg som standard. OBS! Bilden ovan visar hur skohyllan ser ut i bredd 1000 mm.

results.title: Sara skohylla fristående
results.description: Robust fristående skohylla med hyllplan av klarlackerade träribbor. Finns i olika varianter och bredder.

results.title: Ekman hatthylla
results.description: Ekman är en hatthylla med ett halvolvalt hyllplan, ett galgrör och två kroklistbrädor.

results.title: Clothing House
results.description: Olika hus och stugor ligger bakom inspirationen till klädställningen Clothing House, som är designad av Ola Giertz. Kläderna får sitt eget hus som enkelt kan flyttas runt och blir hängare för gästernas ytterplagg och förvaring för dina kläder.

results.title: Skruvad tamburmajor
results.description: Qian Jiang kom till Sverige 2011 och blev direkt fascinerad av skandinavisk design och hantverk. Han uppmärksammade den traditionella snickarbänken som finns i Sverige. Bänkarna har träskruvar som används för att dra åt och lossa greppet på en träbit som sågas, mejslas eller borras. Detta blev inspiration för Skruvad, en kapphängare som ger träskruvarna ett nytt syfte. Föremål kan hängas från vardera sidan och det är möjligt att montera utan att använda några verktyg. Skruvad är tillverkad i massiv bok och finns i svart eller vitt. Den har fyra justerbara träskruvar och kommer i ett platt paket som gör det enkelt att transportera.

results.title: Nostalgi stativset enkel grund
results.description: Genom att använda ett stativset går det att anpassa Nostalgihyllan för användning fristående. Stativen är i stål som pulverlackeras i svart struktur eller vit blank och det finns möjlighet att använda både dubbelsidiga med hyllor på båda sidor, fristående i ett rum, eller enkelsidiga med hyllor på en sida som med fördel ställs mot en vägg. Stativen kommer omonterade med justerbara fötter och plastpluggar för dolda skruvar. Det medföljer golvfästen för att förankra stativen i golvet. Detta bör göras för bästa funktion. På stativseten finns det hål för uppsättning av hatthylla, kroklist och två skohyllor (se miljölbild nedan). Tänk på att det medföljer inga Nostalgihyllor utan detta måste köpas till.

results.title: Nostalgi stativset dubbel grund
results.description: Genom att använda ett stativset går det att anpassa Nostalgihyllan för användning fristående. Stativen är i stål som pulverlackeras i svart struktur eller vit blank och det finns möjlighet att använda både dubbelsidiga med hyllor på båda sidor, fristående i ett rum, eller enkelsidiga med hyllor på en sida som med fördel ställs mot en vägg. Stativen kommer omonterade med justerbara fötter och plastpluggar för dolda skruvar. På stativseten finns det hål för uppsättning av hatthylla, kroklist och två skohyllor (se miljölbild nedan). Tänk på att det medföljer inga Nostalgihyllor utan detta måste köpas till.

results.title: Jaxon
results.description: Jaxon är en klassisk fällsits i massivt trä och monteras upp som en väggstol med beslag av valsat, glansförkromat stål. Standardsitsen är tillverkad i treskiktslimmad massiv 21 mm träsits med rundade hörn i utförande bok, björk, ek eller vitlackerad. Sitsen i rutgaller är tillverkad i treskiktslimmad massiv 21 mm träsits i utförande som slät. Beslagen har fjädring i sig vilket gör att fällsitsen fälls upp av sig själv.

results.title: Sittbänk 67
results.description: Den väggmonterade sittbänken för offentlig miljö är ett givet val för dig som vill kunna erbjuda en funktionell sittplats. Fördelen med att välja en väggmonterad sittbänk är att den sitter stadigt på väggen permanent, utan någon risk att förflytta sig.

results.title: Sittbänk 68
results.description:
En vanlig och enkel sittbänk kan komma till nytta i flera olika sammanhang – inte minst i hallen där det kan vara bekvämt att sitta för att ta på sig skorna. Denna bänk kan enkelt placeras i köket eller som en separat hallmöbel. På grund av att bänken är relativt liten till storleken är det inget problem att hitta ett passande utrymme för den.

Tack vare dess stabila konstruktion finns det ingen risk att den böjs eller går sönder om underlaget inte är helt jämt.

results.title: Sittbänk 69
results.description: Om en vanlig sittbänk inte riktigt kan tillfredställa dina behov, finns möjligheten att istället välja en dubbelsidig variant som har både krokar och ryggstöd. Den dubbelsidiga bänken är lämplig att använda för dig som vill ha flera funktioner vid din sittplats. Se vår produktinformation för de olika alternativ som finns att välja på.

results.title: Sittbänk 70
results.description: Om en vanlig sittbänk inte riktigt kan tillfredställa dina behov, finns möjligheten att istället välja en enkelsidig variant som har både krokar och ryggstöd. Den enkelsidiga bänken är lämplig att använda för dig som vill ha flera funktioner vid din sittplats. Se vår produktinformation för de olika alternativ som finns att välja på.

results.title: 3-pack Galge Triangel
results.description: Galge tillverkad i ett stycke bockat stål. Hängarens rundade hörn minskar risken för att kläder fastnar och riskerar att repas. Öppningen i toppen av galgen medför att den går att hänga upp på de flesta klädhängare. Ligger tre styck i en förpackning.

results.title: Gummerad galge
results.description: Gummerad galge med extra bredd för att skona jackan. Rakt stilrent mittparti med satinfinish på kroken. Elegant design. Gummilack (soft touch) med nonslip-effekt.

results.title: Trägalge 324
results.description: Prisvärd allroundhängare i trä med stång. Enkel design, rak och utrymmessnål modell med byxhängare.

results.title: Trägalge 325
results.description: Prisvärd allroundhängare i trä. Enkel design, rak och utrymmessnål modell.

results.title: Trägalge 807
results.description: En klassisk trähängare perfekt för tröja, jacka eller kavaj. Svängd modell för en stilfull presentation.

results.title: Skruvsats väggmontering
results.description: Uppsättningsskruv på betong-, sten och träväggar för hatthyllor, skohyllor och kroklister. Finns i olika varianter för att passa din produkt. Vi erbjuder endast skruvar för betong-, sten- och träväggar. Har ni endast gipsvägg så rekommenderar vi att kontakta din närmsta fackman för råd om uppsättning.

results.title: Ulrika förvaring
results.description: Ulrika Förvaring är tillverkad av spillmaterial från produktionen av vår hatthylla Nostalgi. Tillsammans med ullfilt och vegetabiliskt garvat läder är det en smart lösning för halsdukar, mössor och vantar, eller för cykelnyckeln. Ullen är en naturprodukt med liten miljöpåverkan och det garvade lädret innehåller inga tungmetaller. Det ofärgade lädret kommer dessutom att med tiden mörkna och få en härlig patina. Varje produkt kan variera i utseende då den är gjord av naturull.

results.title: Index skohorn
results.description: Genom att reducera all överflödig dekoration återstår endast funktion. Index är ett skohorn i sin mest raffinerade form. Så formulerar designstudion Bedow sitt minimalistiska skohorn. Index, som hämtar sitt namn från det pekfinger man använder för att ta på sig skon, kommer i färgerna svart eller vit struktur.

results.title: Ekoxe stövelknekt
results.description: Skona dina skor och rygg med vår Ekoxe stövelknekt som är kokillgjuten i återvunnen aluminium.

results.title: Wall pocket
results.description: Wall Pocket är en förvaring för din bärbara dator, surfplatta, telefon, anteckningsbok, hörlurar eller väska. Perfekt för utrymmen där du snabbt behöver lägga ifrån dig dina saker. Wall Pocket är gjord i laserskuren plåt som är pulverlackerad i svart struktur.

results.title: S-krok
results.description: På Essem Design tror vi att det bästa sättet att ta hand om vår miljö är att skapa produkter som är formgivna och producerade för att hålla över lång tid därför har vi tagit fram tillbehör och reservdelar som gör att din hylla kan leva i flera årtionden. S-kroken är till 100% skapad ur spillet från vår skohylla Tamburin. Den är en del i vårt ständiga arbete att omsorgsfullt utveckla produkter som är bra för miljön, samt håller hög kvalitet.

results.title: Papa klädkrok Svart
results.description: Utställningsexemplar i gott skick. Finns i begränsat antal och vi reserverar oss för slutförsäljning.

results.title: Nostalgi droppskydd
results.description: På Essem Design tror vi att det bästa sättet att ta hand om vår miljö är att skapa produkter som är formgivna och producerade för att hålla över lång tid därför har vi tagit fram tillbehör och reservdelar som gör att din Nostalgihylla kan leva i flera årtionden. Slipp vatten och grus i skorna när du har flera Nostalgi skohyllor ovanför varandra med vårt droppskydd som enkelt fästs på skohyllorna. Passar till Nostalgi standardbredd 1000 mm.

results.title: Nostalgi ankarkrok
results.description: På Essem Design tror vi att det bästa sättet att ta hand om vår miljö är att skapa produkter som är formgivna och producerade för att hålla över lång tid därför har vi tagit fram tillbehör och reservdelar som gör att din Nostalgihylla kan leva i flera årtionden. Få extra upphängning till din Nostalgi hatthylla med 2-pack ankarkrok.

results.title: Oskar
results.description: Hattkrok i aluminium med knopp i björk eller ek. Passar till rör med max 25 mm i diameter. Detta är ett utmärkt tillbehör till Nostalgi hatthylla och Nostalgi kroklist.

results.title: Gustav rörhållare
results.description: Gustav rörhållare används som beslag till Gustav kroklist och Ulrika förvaring. Du kan även använda den till att bygga din egen kroklist. Tillverkad i gjuten aluminium. Passar till 25mm rör/rundstav. Rekommenderad längd ej över 1000 mm. Säljs i 2-pack.

results.title: Office
results.description: Comfortable office chair with soft upholstered seat and back for optimal seating comfort. The seat and back height as well as the back depth can be adjusted infinitely. This means that your back will always have contact with the backrest even at an forward-leaning position. It also allows you to open the hip joint for easier blood circulation. The Office Chair is available in a wide variety of fabrics and colors, such as wool fabric, imitation leather, microfiber or the 3D Runner fabric, which has a very deep texture.

results.title: Office high backrest
results.description: Comfortable office chair with soft upholstered seat and back for optimal seating comfort. The seat and back height as well as the back depth can be adjusted infinitely. This means that your back will always have contact with the backrest even at an forward-leaning position. It also allows you to open the hip joint for easier blood circulation. The Office Chair is available in a wide variety of fabrics and colors, such as wool fabric, imitation leather, microfiber or the 3D Runner fabric, which has a very deep texture.

results.title: DUO red
results.description: The DUO office chair is practical and durable and is designed with two types of fabric. Black imitation leather combined with optional fabric type and color. The seat and backrest are upholstered with cold foam which ensures that you sit soft and comfortably. The EUROMATIC mechanism makes it easy to adjust the seat and backrest. This means that your back will always have contact with the backrest even at an forward-leaning position. It also allows you to open the hip joint for easier blood circulation.

results.title: Dalton Saddle chairs
results.description: The Dalton saddle is an all-round classic saddle, available with or without a backrest

results.title: Mini Saddle chairs
results.description: The Mini saddle is a small saddle, soft and narrow The Mini saddle has a core of wood upholstered with cold foam and fabric or imitation leather. The saddle measures 38 x 29 x 23 cm. and is the smallest of our saddles.

results.title: Pinto Saddle chairs
results.description: The Pinto saddle is an extra soft and comfortable saddle chair. The Pinto saddle is made with a core of wood, and is upholstered with an extra thick layer of cold foam and imitation leather or fabric. The saddle measures 44 x 32 x 29 cm.

results.title: Gamma Saddle chairs
results.description: The Gamma saddle chair is a comfortable, wide bicycle saddle that keeps your back upright and less stressed The Gamma saddle has a core of wood, which is upholstered with cold foam and fabric or imitation leather. The seat measures 35 x 32 x 9 cm.

results.title: Echo
results.description: Echo has a two-part seat that relieves pressure on the spine and pelvis. This means that you can sit comfortably on this chair for considerably longer than on a regular saddle chair. You can easily and infinitely adjust the height, angle and width of the seat for the best possible comfort. This ergonomic saddle chair helps you to sit properly and relaxed. You sit in a so-called rider position, which holds the spine in its natural curve, which reduces tension in the neck, shoulders and loins. The saddle chair also improves blood circulation in the feet and legs as it opens the angle of the hips and knees.

results.title: Pilates Air Seat 3D red
results.description: Pilates Air Seat has the same effect as the Pilates ball. It requires the body to "concentrate on sitting", thus strengthening and maintaining the muscle groups in the back and hip actively while sitting. This stool is with a 500 mm. alu base, 65 mm. easy rolling castors, two of which have brake. This Air seat is upholstered with 3D Runner.

results.title: Pilates Sway 3D blue
results.description: Pilates Sway has a dual active-seating effect. The air cushion in the Pilates seat strengthens and maintains the muscle groups in the back and lumbar actively, while the flexible Sway base allows you constant movement while sitting. The sway base is distinguished by being flexible so you can be in motion while sitting on it. When you use Sway as a standing support, you get a better weight distribution, so you relieve your back and get hold of the large muscle groups in your legs instead. And at the same time you have the opportunity for constant movement.

results.title: PIVO black
results.description: PIVO has a wide height adjustment from sitting to standing position, and you can therefore use it in many places, both as a sit-stand and a stool. With the flat and stable base you can sit relaxed and secure, so you can enjoy comfort along with the healthy movement you naturally gain from the flexible joint. PIVO combines functionality and fine details. The seat can rotate and is easily accessible, and the seat height is easily adjusted with a genuine leather strap.

results.title: Tria - Alu50
results.description: The triangular seat allows for a new sitting position. The chair is light and can be moved quickly. The seat can rotate and is very soft due to the extra upholstery. The seat height is easily adjusted with a leather strap. The chair is available in a large selection of fabrics and colors.

results.title: Tria - Sway
results.description: The triangular seat allows for a new sitting position. The chair is light and can be moved quickly. The seat can rotate and is very soft due to the extra padding. The seat height is easily adjusted with a leather strap. With the flexible sway base, you achieve micro-movements that strengthen your body and keep it going.The chair is available in a large selection of fabrics and colors.

results.title: Tetra - Alu50
results.description: The square seat allows for a new sitting position. The chair is light and can be moved quickly. The seat can rotate and is very soft due to the extra upholstery. The seat height is easily adjusted with a leather strap. The chair is available in a large selection of fabrics and colors.

results.title: Tetra Sway
results.description: The square seat allows for a new seating position. The chair is light and can be moved quickly. The seat can rotate and is very soft due to the extra padding. The seat height is easily adjusted with a genuine leather strap. With the flexible sway base, you achieve micro-movements that strengthen your body and keep it going.The chair is available in a large selection of fabrics and colors.

results.title: Setu Chair
results.description: The function and contours of Setu were shaped by the world around us. The designers of Studio 7.5 observed the ways technology has changed how we work, where we work, and how we move throughout the day.

results.title: Saturn 360°
results.description: Vary your posture during the day with this ergonomic stool. Saturn has a unique design that makes it optimal for you who wants to sit more actively while at the same time relieving your body and making it easy to find a comfortable and ergonomic posture. The stool is equipped with a 360 ° rotating support that can be used as a backrest or armrest depending on how you choose to sit on the chair. The seat is upholstered for optimal seating comfort. This stool is upholstered with 45 mm. cold foam, has a 610 mm. alu base and 50 mm. easy rolling castors.

results.title: Saturn 360° with adjustable armrest
results.description: Vary your posture during the day with this ergonomic stool. Saturn has a unique design that makes it optimal for you who wants to sit more actively while at the same time relieving your body and making it easy to find a comfortable and ergonomic posture. The stool is equipped with a 360 ° rotating support that can be used as a backrest or armrest depending on how you choose to sit on the chair. This support can also be adjusted in height between seat and support.

results.title: Aeron Chair
results.description: We updated the Aeron Chair, adding ocean-bound plastic to the body—all without compromising what makes it the best work chair on Earth.

results.title: Cosm Chairs
results.description: Its sophisticated ergonomic design instantly responds to your body, movement, and posture to provide natural balance and total support.

results.title: Embody Chairs
results.description: Designer Jeff Weber tells you how the Embody chair came to be.

results.title: Asari Chair by Herman Miller
results.description: Make room for the Asari Chair by Herman Miller—upholstered, ergonomic, and a delight to the senses. It provides the performance of a work chair, in a form that is as comfortable as it is beautiful. Get to know the new soft office seating.

results.title: Mirra 2 Chairs
results.description: Studio 7.5 on how Mirra 2 advances how you sit.

results.title: Zeph Chair
results.description: The Zeph Chair finds a happy home between midcentury modern aesthetics and the research-backed ergonomics of today’s work chairs. Its advanced yet simple design offers more for less—more comfort, colors, and style—made with fewer components and at a price that makes it the perfect entrée into the world of Herman Miller performance seating.

results.title: Sayl Chairs
results.description: Photographer Alice Gao was drawn to the unique details of the Sayl Chair.

results.title: Lino Chairs
results.description: Lino brings scientifically-backed comfort and a wide range of aesthetic options to your workplace or home. At Herman Miller, we think everyone should enjoy good design and comfort while they work, and Lino helps make that possibility a reality.

results.title: Verus Chairs
results.description: Verus redefines what an affordable work chair can be. Efficiently designed and engineered to assure ergonomic alignment and support, it gives people both short-term and long-term comfort at an equally comfortable price.

results.title: Eames Aluminum Group Chairs
results.description: Originally commissioned as outdoor seating in 1958, the Eames Aluminum Group has been in demand ever since.

results.title: Eames Soft Pad Chairs
results.description: Sophisticated, refined, with a graceful silhouette. Soft Pad chairs are available in a selection of colors, materials, and bases that allow them to sit well in homes and offices.

results.title: Eames Executive Chairs
results.description: This luxurious chair is an example of Charles Eames’s belief that “details are not details; they make the product.” Generously sized, the executive work chair features a lightweight aluminum frame and base, and finely detailed leather or fabric upholstery accented with covered buttons and edge details typical of traditional fine furniture.

results.title: Eames Task Chairs
results.description: Classic Eames designs thoughtfully reimagined by Danish design house HAY.

results.title: Ruby Chair
results.description: The Ruby Chair's molded polypropylene seat offers both a supportive form and hardwearing, easy-to-clean functionality. With a subtle nod to other seamless one-piece shell chair designs, Ruby distinguishes itself with its wider scooped seat, offered with optional seat pad. Available with a 5-star base and castors.

results.title: Bumper Chair
results.description: The Bumper Chair provides comfort and style in conference rooms, executive offices, and home offices alike. The deceptively simple design is nearly seam-free, with arm cap, inner shell, and outer shell all shaped from one continuous piece of upholstery material. Bumper is available with standard arms or low arms that make it easy to avoid the underside of desks and tables.

results.title: Full Loop Chair
results.description: The Full Loop Chair, designed by EOOS, strikes a poetic balance of form and function. The design blends subtle curves, rich materials, and exceptional comfort in a way that enhances its surroundings wherever it’s used, from conference rooms to home offices. Choose from numerous textile and leather options to create an office chair that expresses your aesthetic.

results.title: About A Chair, Office
results.description: Hee Welling’s versatile About A Chair concept brings uncluttered simplicity and a welcoming expression to any office, from formal corporate settings to home offices. Different shells and bases—together with a wide choice of colors, fabrics, and finishes—give you further options to adapt the chair to practically any environment.

results.title: Always Chair
results.description: Fitted with a 5-star swivel base and casters, the Always Chair’s organic form is ready for quick bursts of work. Constructed using engineered foam over a steel core, the chair achieves a meticulously proportioned shape without compromising support, comfort, or durability. Available in a wide range of upholstery fabrics—including two-tone options.

results.title: Polly Chair
results.description: The Polly Chair is a quiet star performer. Fitted with a 5-star caster base, optional gas lift mechanism, and arms, the Polly Chair provides a comfortable, ergonomically shaped seat and a simple, unobtrusive design. Its base is solid die-cast aluminum, which can be brightly polished or powder-coated in a range of colors. Also available armless.

results.title: Viv Chair
results.description: The NaughtOne Viv Chair features a slim profile, die-cast aluminum 5-star caster base, and arms. Its bucketed seat is molded of 100-percent recyclable, glass-reinforced polypropylene, topped with foam and tightly upholstered. The base can be outfitted with an optional lift mechanism and finished in a range of colors. High-back version available.

results.title: Verus Side Chairs
results.description: Verus redefines what an affordable side chair can be. Stackable up to four high and engineered to assure ergonomic alignment and support, it supplies flexibility and comfort at an equally comfortable price.

results.title: Verus Plus Chairs
results.description: Whether in a hospital waiting area or patient care room, everyone should be able to feel comfortable. Supporting up to 500 pounds with a 30 inch-wide seat and ergonomic arms designed to make sitting and standing easy, Verus Plus brings inclusive comfort to healthcare environments.

results.title: Eames Molded Plastic Chairs
results.description: Classic Eames designs thoughtfully reimagined by Danish design house HAY.

results.title: Eames Wire Chairs
results.description: Classic Eames designs thoughtfully reimagined by Danish design house HAY.

results.title: Eames Molded Plywood Chairs
results.description: Classic Eames designs thoughtfully reimagined by Danish design house HAY.

results.title: Comma Chair
results.description: The strength of Comma is in its details and proportions. Perfectly round curves and right angles offer more than a careful study in elemental geometry, they preserve a generous spirit with an open and welcoming design. Comma Chairs, available with and without arms, work well as dining chairs or as side chairs next to a variety of tables and surfaces.

results.title: Betwixt Chairs
results.description: Ilse Crawford and Oscar Peña of Studioilse created the Betwixt Chair in response to something they struggle to find: an “everywhere” chair that can move between different environments. The designers paired a robust steel frame with wood, upholstery, or composite cork—a material known for its sustainability—to achieve a balance wherever Betwixt is used.

results.title: Caper Stacking Chair
results.description: Designed to accommodate the diversity of people and spaces

results.title: Nemschoff Brava Side Chair
results.description: The sophisticated Brava Side Chair blends a pared-down design with an elegantly curved back and legs. The armless design accommodates various statures and maintains a minimal footprint. The spring seat and durable wood frame make it comfortable and durable in many healthcare settings. Use the Brava Side Chair with the entire family of Brava products to create welcoming exam rooms, patient rooms, and waiting areas.

results.title: Nemschoff Easton Side Chair
results.description: Designed to coordinate with the Easton family of healthcare seating and tables, the Easton Side Chair is a flexible addition to guest and patient areas. The chair boasts an attractive contemporary design that is sturdy, comfortable, and easy to clean. Includes the option for Corian arm caps, a material known for its cleanability, long-lasting durability, and visual appeal.

results.title: Nemschoff Monarch Multiple Seating
results.description: With its sculpted wood arms, comfortable memory foam seat, and versatile style, Monarch Multiple Seating provides a welcome respite. Mix and match the durable pieces to create a configuration that’s just right for any room. Use these connecting chairs with the entire family of Monarch products to make patients and guests feel more at home.

results.title: Nemschoff Valor Multiple Seating
results.description: Style and comfort come together in Valor Multiple Seating. A welcoming seat and contoured arms make these chairs comfortable for visitors, whether they’re just stopping in or there for a while.

results.title: Nemschoff Valor Plus Chair
results.description: The extra seat width featured on the Valor Plus Chair makes any healthcare setting feel more hospitable by accommodating a greater variety of people. Its supportive, contoured arms and comfortable seat match the rest of the Valor family, providing continuity throughout waiting areas and beyond.

results.title: Nemschoff Valor Side Chair
results.description: The Valor Side Chair is ideal for many settings that get a lot of use, thanks to its durable design. The armchair is extremely versatile, with a design that can be used across healthcare facilities, providing continuity throughout. And it’s accessible for many people, with easy movement in and out.

results.title: Nemschoff Valor Stacking Chair
results.description: The Valor Stacking Chair offers the same features that the rest of the Valor Family does—a comfortable seat, supportive arms, and durable frame—with the added bonus of an efficient, space-saving design, making these chairs easy to store (up to three high) and move around.

results.title: Portrait Chair
results.description: The Portrait Chair was the winning entry in a design competition sponsored by Statsbygg (the Norwegian Directorate of Public Construction and Property) and co-organized by the National Museum of Norway. The brief called for a welcoming, multifunctional chair for use in the museum’s public spaces. The jury, led by British designer Jasper Morrison, lauded Portrait as “a beautiful chair that adds a seductive softness and elegance to the room where it will be used.”

results.title: Swoop Lounge Furniture
results.description: Designer Brian Kane tells you how Swoop lounge furniture came to be.

results.title: Bumper Side Chair
results.description: With a choice of tubular metal base or 4-star swivel base, the Bumper Side Chair is one of many Ward Bennett designs borne of his exploration of industrial materials. The curvilinear upholstery lines soften the overall aesthetic, providing a warm welcome to guests wherever it’s used. Bumper is available with standard arms or low arms that make it easy to avoid bumping into the underside of tables.

results.title: 13Eighty Chair
results.description: Created by Dutch designers Scholten & Baijings, HAY’s 13Eighty chair draws its name from the number of tiny holes in its molded polypropylene shell. These variously-sized perforations give 13Eighty a certain transparency, creating a play of light and shadow that brings a sense of movement to the visual appearance. This stackable chair is suitable for use indoors and out.

results.title: About A Chair
results.description: About A Chair has a simple, intuitive form that can blend in or stand out in any environment. Upright and open, the shell balances a high degree of comfort with an inviting expression. The many possible combinations of frame, shell, and colors make About A Chair an ultra-flexible and versatile celebration of individuality.

results.title: Result Chair
results.description: The Result Chair features a thin steel-sheet base with a wooden seat and backrest, retaining maximum flexibility, lightness, and strength. Originally created by Friso Kramer and Wim Rietveld while working at Ahrend in the 1950s, the cutout steel collection has been relaunched by HAY together with Ahrend.

results.title: Revolt Chair
results.description: Originally created for Ahrend in the 1950s, the Revolt Chair is one of Friso Kramer’s most famous designs. A revolutionary design, it uses bent sheet steel instead of a traditional tubular frame. The design is reproduced today by HAY and Ahrend using the original process but offered in a mix of more sustainable materials.

results.title: Soft Edge Chair
results.description: Iskos-Berlin’s Soft Edge Chair blends strong curves with extreme lightness. In keeping with its name, all the edges of the soft-formed, molded plywood seats are bent away from the body, a detail that maximizes comfort even as you shift and move in the seat. A steel base reinforces its light, uncluttered aesthetics. Available with upholstered seat.

results.title: Hee Chair
results.description: Like a minimalist line drawing, metal wire is wrapped into neat, straight lines to create this contemporary chair that can work well in a wide range of spaces—indoors or out. The metal wire is electro-galvanized before it is lacquered, which makes it rust-resistant. These stackable chairs also can be linked together in rows for conference use.

results.title: Palissade Chair
results.description: Designed for HAY by French brothers Ronan and Erwan Bouroullec, the Palissade Chair is part of a collection of outdoor furniture united by a common principle of symmetrical geometry. Named after a slatted fence, the Palissade family is designed in color and form to integrate effortlessly into a natural landscape or urban setting.

results.title: Petit Standard Chair
results.description: With the objective of creating a highly stackable chair—one in which the stackable functionality actually enhances the chair’s design—Daniel Rybakken embarked on an eight-year journey. The result was the Petit Standard, a study in precision and considered details. The high back and curved seat ensure comfort; the steel tubing ensures strength.

results.title: Élémentaire Chair
results.description: Élémentaire uses 100-percent recycled polypropylene to create an eco-friendly chair that's robust enough to be a long-lasting object while still appearing delicate. This charming chair stands out on its own and looks strong in a group. Designed for everyday life, it fulfills basic needs in a balance of beauty and strength.

results.title: Magis Chair_One
results.description: Discover Magis and their full range of products.

results.title: Magis Déjà-vu Chair
results.description: Discover Magis and their full range of products.

results.title: Magis Dressed First
results.description: Discover Magis and their full range of products.

results.title: Magis Folding Air-Chair
results.description: Discover Magis and their full range of products.

results.title: Magis Officina Chair
results.description: Discover Magis and their full range of products.

results.title: Magis Stanley Chair
results.description: Discover Magis and their full range of products.

results.title: Magis Steelwood Chair
results.description: Discover Magis and their full range of products.

results.title: Magis Troy Plastic Chair
results.description: Discover Magis and their full range of products.

results.title: Magis Troy Upholstered Chair
results.description: Discover Magis and their full range of products.

results.title: Magis Milà Chair
results.description: Discover Magis and their full range of products.

results.title: Always Side Chair
results.description: With an organic form, various base options, and a wide selection of upholstery fabrics, the Always Side Chair complements practically any interior. Meticulously proportioned to offer back support and a comfortable enclosed feeling, the chair uses molded foam over a steel core to achieve a refined shape without compromising comfort and durability.

results.title: Polly Side Chair
results.description: Named for its polypropylene shell, the Polly Side Chair provides an ergonomically shaped seat with minimal visual clutter. A soft texture and just the right amount of flex combine to improve the sitting experience. Thanks to NaughtOne's versatile color range, Polly can be made to stand out or blend in wherever it's used.

results.title: Polly Wood Chair
results.description: The Polly Wood Chair’s name is a direct reference to its core materials: the molded seat shell is 100-percent recyclable glass re-enforced polypropylene and the base is solid wood. Available in a range of colors, the seat shell is shaped ergonomically for comfort, which can be further enhanced by an optional upholstered seat pad.

results.title: Ruby Side Chair
results.description: The simple, elegant Ruby Side Chair pairs a 100-percent recyclable molded polypropylene shell with a choice of a dowel base, sled base, 4-leg base, or 4-star base with glides. Choose from a range of shell colors, base finishes, and optional upholstered seat pads to create a combo that works for your workplace, classroom, or restaurant, or café.

results.title: Ruby Wood Chair
results.description: This Ruby Wood Chair takes center stage thanks to the generous use of solid hardwood in the base. Paired with the matte finish of the molded polypropylene seat common to the Ruby Seating family, the wood base gives a real sense of the material and tactile value of the design. Available in a choice of seat shell colors and wood finishes.

results.title: Viv Side Chair
results.description: The NaughtOne Viv Side Chair's bucketed seat is contoured for comfort, topped with dense foam, and tightly upholstered. Base options include a steel sled base, a 4-leg steel base, a 4-leg wood dowel base, and a die-cast aluminum 4-star base with optional arms. All Viv Side Chairs come in a lively range of powder coat colors and upholstery options.

results.title: Viv Wood Chair
results.description: The Viv Wood Chair is a staple of the NaughtOne portfolio. Its slender shape is achieved thanks to a 3D-formed plywood shell, layered in dense foam and skillfully upholstered to create a comfortable bucketed seat. This version features a base cut from solid wood, assembled with traditional techniques, then sealed with matte lacquer.

results.title: Bounce Chair
results.description: As bold and buoyant as its name suggests, the Bounce Chair provides a surprising level of comfort for a side chair thanks to the independent movement of its molded plywood seat and backrest. Easy to lift, carry, and stack neatly, the frame is constructed from a single bent steel tube, which is available in a range of colors.

results.title: Pronta Stacking Chair
results.description: A new sweet spot of form and function, Pronta Stacking Chair combines sophisticated looks and high-stacking agility in one essential, versatile design.

results.title: Magis Air-Chair
results.description: Discover Magis and their full range of products.

results.title: Magis Chair First
results.description: Discover Magis and their full range of products.

results.title: Magis Plato Chair
results.description: Discover Magis and their full range of products.

results.title: Aeron Stool
results.description: We updated the Aeron Chair, adding ocean-bound plastic to the body—all without compromising what makes it the best work chair on Earth.

results.title: Cosm Stool
results.description: The sophisticated ergonomic design of the Cosm stool instantly responds to your body, movement, and posture to provide natural balance and total support. No matter who sat in the stool before you, how long you’ll be in it, or what you’ll be doing, the Cosm Stool gives you a new experience of comfort—anywhere you work.

results.title: Mirra 2 Stool
results.description: Consider additional protection on select products from odor- and stain-causing mold, mildew, algae, and bacteria.

results.title: Sayl Stool
results.description: Sayl, made with ocean-bound plastic

results.title: Zeph Stool
results.description: The Zeph Stool finds a happy home between the sunny optimism of mid-century modern aesthetics and the science-backed ergonomics of today’s work chairs. Its advanced yet simple design offers more for less—more comfort, colors, and style—made with fewer components and at a price that makes it the perfect entrée into the world of Herman Miller high-performance seating.

results.title: Lino Stool
results.description: Designed by Sam Hecht and Kim Colin, Lino brings scientifically backed comfort and a wide range of aesthetic options to your workplace or home. At Herman Miller, we think everyone should enjoy good design and comfort while they work, and the Lino Stool helps make that possibility a reality.

results.title: Verus Stool
