results.title: Höganäs +502
results.description: Höganäs +502 är i grunden samma stol som +501 med skillnaden att den är helt klädd i tyg och saknar därmed plastkant runt sitsen och ryggbrickan.

results.title: Lei
results.description: Lei sammanför innovativ teknik och slående design på ett revolutionerande sätt.

results.title: Ergo Sun
results.description: Stolen Ergo Sun var det första produktresultatet av sammanslagningen mellan Officeline och Höganäsmöbler. Kombinationen av Sten Engdals klassiska design och Officelines moderna teknik visade sig vara sällsynt lyckad.

results.title: Mesh
results.description: Mesh har en synkron gungfunktion som ger maximalt stöd genom att följa kroppens naturliga rörelser både i framåt- och tillbakalutad arbetsställning. Detta ger maximalt stöd av svank, ländrygg och bröstrygg samtidigt som möjligheten finns att luta sig tillbaka och öppna upp höftleden.

results.title: Size
results.description: Stolen Size har en freefloatgunga som gör att du kan låsa rygg och sits oberoende av varandra och på så vis variera din arbetsställning.

results.title: Surf
results.description: Surf ger dig maximalt stöd och följsamma rörelser med sin synkrongunga. Surf följer kroppens naturliga rörelser både i framåt- och tillbakalutad arbetsställning. Surf finns även med Freefloat-mekanism vilket innebär att sits och rygg rör sig oberoende av varandra och är låsbara var för sig. Välj att låsa ryggen men låt sitsen följa rörelserna, eller tvärtom.

results.title: Point
results.description: Point är en ergonomisk balanspall som hjälper dig att sitta på ett korrekt och avslappnat sätt.

results.title: Polo S
results.description: Stolen har en liten och mjuk sits stoppad med polyeter och t-skum allt för att ge bästa möjliga sittkomfort med högsta kvalitet. Stolen är lämplig till användning i de flesta miljöer bla dental, medicin, industri och kontor.

results.title: Polo M
results.description: Stolen passar de flestas behov av sittande, lite bredare modell än Polo Small.

results.title: Polo Split
results.description: Stolen är utrustad med en aktiv mekanik som gör sitsdelarna rörliga i förhållande till varandra. Vid belastning anpassar sig sitsen efter användarens behov på ett helt unikt sätt.

results.title: Circle
results.description: Sitsens runda utformning ger användaren en god komfort. Stolen har en ring under sitsen som enkelt höjdjusterar pallen oberoende av sittposition.

results.title: Kari
results.description: Sits och rygg är vinklingsbara och ryggen kan justeras i höjd och djupled.

results.title: Jenna
results.description: Jenna är en enkel och mycket prisvärd arbetsstol som passar utmärkt för kontorsarbete i hem- eller skolmiljö.

results.title: Jenna Synkron
results.description: Jenna Synkron är en prisvärd arbetsstol med enkel gungfunktion och ställbar rygg.

results.title: Ronna
results.description: Stolen Ronna är en ergonomisk och prisvärd arbetsstol med tydliga och enkla reglage.

results.title: Slim
results.description: Slim som vår smidigaste arbetsstol är utformad för flexibla arbetsplatser i skolan eller hemmet. Den okomplicerade utformning och de logiska funktionerna bidrar till att skapa en ändamålsenlig arbetsmiljö.

results.title: Bord 0773X
results.description: Med våra ljusa och lätta lunchrumsbord skapar du enkelt en trevlig atmosfär.

results.title: Rullhurts 20402
results.description: Hurts med 3 lådor, varav en mapplåda, och med ett djup på 600 mm.

results.title: Sidoskåp 41806
results.description: Förvaring som hjälper dig att hålla arbetsytorna fria och hålla ordning på din arbetsplats.

results.title: Sidoskåp 41860
results.description: Förvaring som hjälper dig att hålla arbetsytorna fria och hålla ordning på din arbetsplats.

results.title: Stålis Stol
results.description: Stol i svart eller silverlackat stål. Toppstycke i formpressad bok eller björk. Välj mellan klädd sits eller sits i bok eller björk.

results.title: Blockchain
results.description:
The Blockchain pendant consists of eight square cubes put together apparently random. A single cube traveling through time and space – rendering a sequence of positions before the beholder. But there is order in chaos. Every second cube has a built in LED panel designed and directed to spread an even light on whatever is below. The cubes form an angular silhouette seemingly floating in the air. Design Markus Johansson (Sweden)
Dimensions 931 x 134 mm
Materials Steel with acrylic diffuser.

results.title: Notic wall lamp
results.description: Notic is an homage to classical architectural elements. The graphical metal shade embraces the complex geometry of the glass and spreads the light in a hypnotic way. The lamp has a focused down light combined with a gentle illumination through the shade. With the resemblance of a hypnotic pendulum the beholder might even find something within themselves. The idea behind the lamp was to design a focus point in a three-dimensional space. A room needs virtual lines and directions to guide the visitor but also to create defined spatiality. The pattern does not only work as a design element and a way to spread the light, the sharp contrast also draws immediate attention.

results.title: Arch Circle – Black
results.description: Coming soon The newly launched Arch quickly became a favorite and it wasn’t long before several constellations were in demand. The architectural arches are still the foundation in construction and design but now in a new dress and aesthetic. “We see this member as an extension and with this contribution the Arch´s has now become a family.

results.title: Cirrata
results.description: Unexpected experiences and surprises wait deep down on the ocean floor: a body with many arms lights up the depth. Arrogant and presumptuous, there is no doubt about who is the ruler down here. A lonely but nevertheless unafraid character with forms born out of the resemblance to other inhabitants of the unknown. The character is Cirrata, a glowing lamp in the darkness of the ocean. Markus Johansson has created a lamp that challenges all ideas about what is possible to make out of aluminium. The symmetrical arms equally carry the weight of the lamp.

results.title: Mondo Floor lamp
results.description: Mondo Floor lamp has a classic soul but contemporary ambitions. It combines a planetary physical image with an abstract concept of originality programmed by the beholder. The possibility of interacting with the lamp offers the user an infinite dialogue. The overlapping patterns control the luminous effect through the movement of the metallic shades. Antonio Facco has created a sophisticated lamp that invites the user to become a co-designer.

results.title: Balance
results.description: All entities move and nothing remains still. Balance plays with the concept of time – everything is in motion. The impossible position of the orbs is an expression of the fragility of existence. The group of spheres stuck in time is a reminder to the beholder that life always moves, no matter what. The construction is made from of a pair of glowing orbs poised between two slanted steel boards. The metal spheres seen on both sides have just the right density to counterweight the opposite part of the lamps’ weight. the overall structure is grounded by a black marble base.

results.title: Lightbone Blue Oak
results.description: coming soon The Lightbone design by FÄRG & BLANCHE was first shown as part of the Armour Mon Amour exhibition during Milan Design Week 2017.

results.title: Trapeze Triplette
results.description: Trapeze Triplette is a true artist, an aerialist combining grace and style. Fixed in a single pose with endless possibilities. Each shade can be directed 360 degrees which allows the user to combine uplight and down light at the same time. A playful and bold feature that also is pragmatic and practical in use. Trapeze is available in three versions. The single pendant with two shades, the ’triplette’ with six shades or the ’quartette’ with eight shades. All these fixtures makes it possible to adjust and direct the light where it is needed.

results.title: Helios Plafond
results.description: Coming soon The majestic crystal chandelier has now become a glowing half sphere. With its 120 Japanese acrylic rods, mirroring chrome details give the fixture a elegant but yet bold appearance. Each acrylic rod is lit by an individual LED and there is also a slightly backlight to eliminate dark shadows on the ceiling, instead it creates a magical halo.

results.title: Arch white
results.description:
An arch shape travels from light to light and in its entirety a pendant that resemble and shows appreciation to the architectural arches/vaults that has been built for centuries. The seven pillars equipped with a light source each will provide downlight on our various spaces at home as well as public spaces.  Perfect for kitchen tables, -islands, conference rooms and offices. The fixture has an alluring and eye-catching design that consists of a metal exterior in different colors. Design Johan Lindsten form & Markus Johansson design (Sweden)
Dimensions 200 mm (H), 1256 mm (L), 55mm (W)
Materials Steel, chrome fitting details, transparent cable
Fitting GU10 socket (Light bulb not included)
Color White (RAL 9003)

results.title: Mondo Triplette
results.description: Mondo Triplette is a configuration of three Mondo pendant and a ceiling canopy. The lamp has a classic soul but contemporary ambitions. It combines a planetary physical image with an abstract concept of originality programmed by the beholder. The possibility of interacting with the lamp offers the user an infinite dialogue. The overlapping patterns control the luminous effect through the movement of the metallic shades. Antonio Facco has created a sophisticated lamp that invites the user to become a co-designer.

The idea behind the lamp was to design a focus point in a three-dimensional space. A room needs virtual lines and directions to guide the visitor but also to create defined spatiality. The pattern does not only work as a design element and a way to spread the light, the sharp contrast also draws immediate attention.

results.title: Blockchain system – 11 Cubes
results.description: coming soon The Blockchain System consists of extruded aluminum cubes, attached together apparently random. A single cube traveling through time and space – rendering a sequence of positions for the beholder. But there is order in chaos, a millimeter precision to create this perfect silhouette. Every second cube is lit with a custom-made LED panel designed and directed to spread a uniform light distribution on whatever is below. The cubes form an abstract silhouette in angles seemingly floating in the air.

results.title: Trapeze Quartette
results.description: Trapeze Quartette is a true artist, an aerialist combining grace and style. Fixed in a single pose with endless possibilities. Each shade can be directed 360 degrees which allows the user to combine uplight and down light at the same time. A playful and bold feature that also is pragmatic and practical in use. Trapeze is available in three versions. The single pendant with two shades, the ’triplette’ with six shades or the ’quartette’ with eight shades. All these fixtures makes it possible to adjust and direct the light where it is needed.

results.title: Helios
results.description:
Helios is an aspiration to reinvent the classical chandelier – but instead of reflecting and diffusing, the rods project and enhance the light. Each of the 240 acrylic rods are lit by an individual LED, hidden in the centre of the lamp. The pendant is two faced –
when turned off Helios has a cold and crisp appearance. Turned on, the lamp comes alive and the intensity of the many acrylic rods portray a glowing
sphere resembling the sun. An almost transcendental appearance. Design Joakim Thedin (Sweden)
Dimensions 534 mm (H), 600 mm (Ø)
Materials Steel with acrylic diffuser.

results.title: Inside
results.description: Inside pendant is a tribute to the most generous and kind lady in the city of Bergen, Norway. The pendant is an attempt to materialize her genuine enthusiasm, passion and knowledge about design into a single object. The name comes from the twisted inner glass. The hand blown shape makes every lamp unique diffusing and spreading the light in a gentle pattern. The pattern is an extension of the design and what makes Inside so special.

results.title: The Phone booth
results.description:
We want our modern phone booths to be both functional and comfortable in use. As a result, we made sure to install a USB plug and power supply, so you’ll never run out of power. Also, the booth’s powerful airflow inlet and ventilation system provide a pleasant climate inside.

To silence the phone booth, we’ve insulated it with 22 mm sound absorbing foam. When closing the door, which has a magnetic seal, PhoneAlone therefore becomes your private room that allows for intense concentration and undisturbed communication.
You can feel perfectly safe inside the booth – the glass is laminated safety glass and the cladding contains fire retardant materials. Enjoy your PhoneAlone!

results.title: Calm Studio
results.description: A new booth-concept Calm Studio, a place for focus and acoustic comfort.

results.title: The Meeting booth
results.description: Our modern meeting booth is created for functional meetings and has room for four persons. PhoneAlone’s meeting booth is equipped with six fans for a better indoor climate. The ventilation system is activated by a motion sensor, which simultaneously activates the light and power inside the meeting booth. The worktable inside the meeting booth is installed on a lightweight metal track. This makes the table movable and allows for the meeting booth to be turned into a small office or workspace. The 22 mm sound absorbing and fire retardant foam and felt inside the meeting booth facilitate noise cancellation very efficiently. When closing the door, which has a magnetic seal, PhoneAlone therefore becomes your private meeting room that allows for intense concentration and undisturbed meetings.

results.title: The Double Booth
results.description: Our double booth, which only takes up 2 m2 space, provides the perfect setting for focused conversations and meeting between two persons. The double booth also works well as a small office for one person. The booth is equipped with four silent ventilators, which facilitate a pleasant indoor climate. These ventilators are activated by a motion sensor, which simultaneously actives light and power inside the double booth. The worktable inside the double booth is installed on a lightweight metal track. This makes the table movable and allows for the double booth to be turned into a small office or workspace. The 22 mm sound absorbing and fire retardant foam and felt inside the double booth facilitate noise cancellation very efficiently. When closing the door, which has a magnetic seal, PhoneAlone therefore becomes your private room that allows for intense concentration and undisturbed meetings.

results.title: Automatic disinfection
results.description:
Today, keeping the office clean to reduce the spread of bacteria and viruses is more vital than ever. This of course also applies to the PhoneAlone phone booths, which is why we have developed an automatic UV solution that disinfects all visible surfaces in the booth after use in less than three minutes.

Our revolutionary UV solution is easily installed inside the top of the booth ensuring a carefree use of the PhoneAlone phone booths for everyone in the office. In addition, the UV solution now makes it easier to clean the walls inside the booth. All phone booths are lined with felt or other sound-absorbing material reducing noise yet making it difficult to clean from bacteria. Now, the walls are easily and smoothly cleaned by the UV solution, which simultaneously functions as an effective helper to the cleaning staff of your business.

results.title: Acoustic Ceiling & Light
results.description: See the wide range of ceiling acoustic solutions also including light. The effectiveness in terms of acoustic panels and tailor-made solutions is designed and integrated into a range of products, using performance through three technologies: Ecorange, Tailor Made, Felt.

results.title: Acoustic Curtain
results.description: Contemporary spaces need flexibility. The solutions must be at the service of the user. So here is âdotsâ, a practical and semi-transparent sound-absorbing curtain. Particularly suitable for screening glass walls of meeting rooms.

results.title: Acoustic Desk
results.description: The effectiveness in terms of acoustic panels and tailor-made solutions is designed and integrated into a range of products, using performance through three technologies: Ecorange, Tailor Made, Felt.

results.title: Acoustic Fitout
results.description: The effectiveness in terms of acoustic panels and tailor-made solutions is designed and integrated into a range of products, using performance through three technologies: Ecorange, Tailor Made, Felt.

results.title: Acoustic Freestanding
results.description: The effectiveness in terms of acoustic panels and tailor-made solutions is designed and integrated into a range of products, using performance through three technologies: Ecorange, Tailor Made, Felt.

results.title: Acoustic Furniture
results.description: Research, innovation and products for acoustic soundscapes and best comfort.The effectiveness in terms of acoustics is designed and integrated into our range of products, and performance through three technologies: Ecorange, Tailor Made, Felt.

results.title: Acoustic Partition
results.description: By playing with transparencies and panels, it allows you to maintain the relationship with the environment by cutting out privacy corners or spaces. Thanks to the density of the material, these elements become real soundproofing barriers.

results.title: Acoustic Wall & Light
results.description: See the wide range of wall acoustic solutions also including light. The effectiveness in terms of acoustic panels and tailor-made solutions is designed and integrated into a range of products, using performance through three technologies: Ecorange, Tailor Made, Felt.

results.title: Stay Safe Partition
results.description: With reference to health situations, Slalom can offer a line of panels entirely made of Plexiglass. Another collection allows you to use the plexiglass protector on our brackets, in combination with ECOdesk panels when you want, or entirely in protection of plexi.

results.title: Campeggi Acca
results.description: A soft and cosy cube, designed by Giulio Manzoni (2003) hides a new kind of convertible seat: armchair, chaise longue and single bed. Acca can be easily adapted as required from time to time and it can be freely moved from one room to another thanks to its castors and to its contained proportions which can comfortably fit through standard sized doors.

results.title: Campeggi Aoy
results.description: Open or renew your home with Aoy, a new modular system held up by strong chromed steel feet, covered with a completely removable fabric. This special characteristic highlights the simple and clean style of Aoy. Moreover, with an easy movement, the armchair becomes a bed and you feel like sleeping on a real bed, well lifted from the ground and resistant.

results.title: Campeggi Baba
results.description: To set up an extra bed late at night or in a small room must be done without stress: Baba, with its practical lightweight structure, is the perfect armchair.  It readily becomes a comfortable single bed with header, by removing the washable cover and by opening the mechanism which includes the welded steel sleeping surface and the free CFC polyurethane foam mattress.

results.title: Campeggi Bibi
results.description: Bibi is suitable for all environments thanks to its essential design and easy use.All you need to do to turn the chair into a bed is to lift off the hooded cover.

results.title: Campeggi Brill
results.description: In the most different contexts, from an office, a living room or a kids room, the presence of a chair can define an island of space for speaking, reading, playing or relaxing. Brill proportions are well designed to avoid making it a bulky object, while its convertibility into a single bed gives you the freedom to reinvent the use of a room whenever you want it.

results.title: Campeggi Bu
results.description: Bu armchair is characterized by a very clean line, inspired by that of tub armchairs: small and contained dimensions as well as polyurethane stuffing and polyester padding to make it comfortable and very relaxing. Thanks to Bu, the pleasure of having people around becomes simple and comfortable.

results.title: Campeggi Dandy
results.description: Dandy is an enfolding sofa completely soft and endowed with removable fabric covers. Its reclining arms become support benches very useful for reading, its inside becomes a comfortable bed ideal for small spaces that need to be furnished with taste and harmony. Dandy will strike you with the ease of transformation into a bed and its compactness.

results.title: Campeggi Go Small
results.description: A sofa bed that can be easily arranged in any living space thanks to its geometrical and linear configuration. Go Small offers a very versatile sofa bed that can be easily transformed into a relaxing bed. Thanks to its steel frame it is extremely solid and resistant, even when used frequently.

results.title: Campeggi Molly
results.description: The soft Molly is an armchair with a classic and tranquil touch that transforms into a bed by a simple 90Ë degree rotation. The fabric is available in many different fabrics to allow a full integration with different living styles.

results.title: Campeggi Oops
results.description: Less is more: simple shapes on a square and minimal base for one of Giulio Manzoniâs (2010) designs. Oops is a super convertible solid easy chair: a relaxing form which can become a twin double bed or a single bed with a bedside table, a pouf or an armchair with backrest and armrests

results.title: Campeggi Pisola
results.description: A reduced-dimension armchair with a domestic air, which can contain an airbed. An incorporated electric pump grants in a few seconds this new invention by Denis Santachiara (1999), able to amaze and touch.

results.title: Campeggi Virgola
results.description: From a seat hovers a comma shaped band which wraps, turning it into an arm and back of a small armchair.

results.title: Campeggi Woody
results.description: Sofa bed and armchair easy to convert. Steel structure, wooden bed slats with resin dampers. Polyester wadding quilt that can be separated from the covering. High density polyurethane mattress.

results.title: Campeggi TutÃ¹
results.description: TutÃ¹ presents itself in an essential multifunctional softly squared style that can become a large ottoman, a single bed, a shelf, covered by a practical liner that reaches down to the ground. It could be placed anywhere in the house, versatile in just a square meter.

results.title: laCividina Anytime
results.description: All of the armchairs, sofas and benches in the Anytime selection have slender feet.The line has earned classic status thanks to its understated, elegant appearance.

results.title: Dieffebi Benci
results.description: The Dieffebi bench, designed to furnish private homes as well as museums, gardens, waiting rooms, showrooms and public spaces in general. Proves the capability of this company from the Veneto to construct and process sheet metal. Usable indoors and out, due to metal being a hard-wearing, completely eco-friendly material, Benci is coated with epoxy powders in a range of different colours.

results.title: laCividina Join
results.description: The Join collection is based on the need to make the boundaries between homes and public spaces increasingly hard to see.

results.title: laCividina Line Bench
results.description: This extraordinarily simple bench can be used as both a seat and a coffee table.

results.title: Lapalma Panco
results.description: Stemming from rural tradition, it exudes contemporary elegance. With its bold character, legs made of powder-coated stainless steel sheet, and a dynamic slit in the side, as a bench PANCO makes a statement in any outdoor setting. When concealed under the table, it retains the line of the table to which it faithfully belongs.

results.title: laCividina Socrate
results.description: Simple, understated seating is the philosophy behind this collection. With its Socrate sofas and armchairs, LaCividina has returned to the origins of form and created elegant seating that offers sublime comfort.

results.title: laCividina Waves
results.description: Waves is a collection of poufs inspired by the sea and the soft, gentle ripples running along the surface of the water.

results.title: Lapalma Za Module
results.description: According to the Japanese tradition, âzaâ refers to a safe place for meeting and, at one time, such places were monasteries. Inspired by this concept,the ZA seating system was created to delineate relationships in space, encouraging encounters and conviviality.Thanks to corner elements, circular and semi-circular compositions can be created with wood benches, which can be reconfigured over time, according to requirements and interaction.

results.title: Campeggi AlÃ¨
results.description: AlÃ¨ is characterized by a strong attention to ergonomics and a generous design inspired by modern sofas with a wide seat. A classic but young and bright sofa, provided with two single wide polyester cushions which soften the line of the backrest and don't need to be removed to pull out the bed.

results.title: Campeggi Alfabeta

results.title: Campeggi Aoy

This special characteristic highlights the simple and clean style of Aoy. Moreover, with an easy movement, the sofa becomes a bed and you feel like sleeping on a real bed, well lifted from the ground and resistant.

results.title: Campeggi Lazy Basketball
results.description: For basketball lovers but not only: Lazy Basketball is a metal structure chair with a back made of synthetic net. It has a simple and winding shape which ends with a real bang: a funny colorful basket.

results.title: Campeggi Big Bag

results.title: Campeggi Dandy
results.description: Dandy is an enfolding sofa completely soft and endowed with removable fabric covers. Dandy will strike you with the ease of transformation into a bed and its compactness.

results.title: Campeggi Flower
results.description: The Flower modular system by Giulio Manzoni (2019) allows you to build countless customized solutions, with cosy and convenient linear or corners systems, with or without bed, thanks to its fitting modules.

results.title: Campeggi Go
results.description: A perfect marriage of technology and design is expressed in Go, the new sofa with a revolutionary mechanism. An imposing aspect, together with its generous cushioning, make Go a matchless sofa bed. Just one easy and effortless motion, made possible by its technologically advanced mechanism, converts Go into the definitive bed for every night.

results.title: Campeggi Go Small
results.description: A sofa bed that can be easily arranged in any living space thanks to its geometrical and linear configuration. results.title: Campeggi Go.Up.

results.title: Campeggi Iboo

Iboo is a real sofa and a real bed: this is shown by the incredible mechanism that in a flash, transforms it in use and appearance.

results.title: Campeggi Lowe

results.title: Lapalma Jazz
results.description: A light, linear and yet very powerful harmony, marked by that apparent spontaneity which is a distinctive feature of the most outstanding jazz performances. And just as music develops from a theme, making it evolve into variations, this bookcase stems from a deep base, of different lengths, from which supporting elements emerge and which, in turn, interlock with other surfaces and replicate an imaginary stave. A musical score that defines and keeps all contexts fluid, JAZZ, from the office to the home.

results.title: Dieffebi Miaped
results.description: Dynamic and compact, Mia Ped is a personal container that can be completely arranged by the user. It is designed to accommodate modern âsmart officeâ working tools and can also be transformed into a seat. It is made of metal and is equipped with retractable wheels. It comes in various trendy colours and can be used both individually and in multiple compositions.

results.title: Dieffebi Primo
results.description: Primo cabinets, with metal, acoustic and melamine doors, combine a pleasing essence in design, with a high storage capacity. Made of metal, available in various heights (from 1 to 5 dox), they can be placed in any space and easily aggregated in multiple compositions and they can also be used to split and organize the environment.

results.title: Dieffebi Primo Acoustic
results.description: Primo cabinets, with metal, acoustic and melamine doors, combine a pleasing essence in design, with a high storage capacity. Made of metal, available in various heights (from 1 to 5 dox), they can be placed in any space and easily aggregated in multiple compositions and they can also be used to split and organize the environment.

results.title: Dieffebi Trendline
results.description: Trendline cabinets, easy and clean design in recycled metal. Perfect for office, schools and other environments that requires a durable design. Available in several heights (from 1 to 4 doors), can easily put together in various compositions. 100% recyclable.

results.title: laCividina Ala
results.description: The inspiration for Alaâs design came from the stands for old plates on display in a decorative arts museum. It is plain to see in this collection of armchairs and sofas with a vintage flavour.

results.title: laCividina Bernard
results.description: Bernard is a complete and versatile collection, suitable in both residential and contract.

results.title: Campeggi Gilbert George
results.description: Gilbert & George is a big pouf composed of two elements perfectly fitting together, drawing a line that suggests different uses.

results.title: laCividina Guest
results.description: Attractive designs and the comfort created in a masterful production process can add a warm, welcoming touch to household and public settings where great hospitality is a top priority. This is the case with the Guest selection of sofas, armchairs and poufs.

results.title: laCividina Join
results.description: The Join collection is based on the need to make the boundaries between homes and public spaces increasingly hard to see.

results.title: Lapalma Kipu
results.description: This KIPU pouf resembles the shape of a pebble, a natural object par excellence. In its largest version, it becomes a comfortable seat that is also ideal for relaxing. Minimum dimensions, maximum versatility.

results.title: laCividina Modo
results.description: Building blocks in the form of furniture. The pouf can serve as a stand-alone piece or be combined with others in an array of sophisticated colours and irregular shapes.

results.title: laCividina Molecule
results.description: The seat acts like a central atom, with round coffee tables and poufs attached to it.

results.title: laCividina Ploff
results.description: A completely handmade seat or table, in different sizes that can be joined together and layered.

results.title: Campeggi Santapouf
results.description: Santapouf is Denis Santachiaraâs (2011) great idea for âbed everywhereâ, converted in a smoother overlapped curved continuous line. The curvy line copies the sculptures with continuous profiles, the best known Italian exponent was Giuseppe Bertelli (1900-1974). Santapouf is used as a small seat, a table and blows up into a last minute bed.

results.title: Campeggi Santapouf Pro
results.description: inspired by the continuous profile sculptures by Giuseppe Bertelli (1900-1974), Denis Santachiara's Santapouf Pro is a soft pouf, whose lines can be reminiscent of the features of Andy Warhol, Pablo Picasso, Marcel Duchamp or Le Corbusier.

results.title: Campeggi TutÃ¹
results.description: TutÃ¹ presents itself in an essential multifunctional softly squared style that can become a large ottoman, a single bed, a shelf, covered by a practical liner that reaches down to the ground. It could be placed anywhere in the house, versatile in just a square meter.

results.title: laCividina Velour
results.description: A range of 63 elements that can be freely face-to-face arrangements.

results.title: laCividina Waves
results.description: Waves is a collection of poufs inspired by the sea and the soft, gentle ripples running along the surface of the water.

results.title: laCividina Windmill
results.description: As its name suggests, this delicate, colourful collection of poufs was inspired by windmills.

results.title: Lapalma Arco
results.description: 4 legs and a swivel base: ARCO is a chair with impeccable yet comfortable design, thanks to evenly curved wood.

results.title: Campeggi XL
results.description: All you need for days and nights, by Giulio Manzoniâs idea (2009): XL is a stylish and comfortable large sized padded ottoman during the day and a cosy single bed or a surprising queen size bed for nights.

results.title: Campeggi Zoom
results.description: The Zoom pouf widens up the space according to Giulio Manzoniâs (2009) style: itâs an absolutely versatile small size seat, but the resin and polyurethane foam body chassis includes a real double bed.

results.title: Lapalma Aaron
results.description: In a single line, dynamic and minimal, two functions, stool and coffee table together with an integrated footrest. It is called AARON, double âAâ in the name, to underline the multi-tasking generosity of a design that limits the overall space and guarantees privacy and relaxation. From a metal stem, a padded seat and a pivoting table top sprout. Functionality and elegance in times of newfound openness and confidentiality. Floor fixing possible.

results.title: Lapalma Ap
results.description: Is it a stool or a sculpture? It is both. Stackable and resistant, AP almost resembles a hat. Elegant and refined, it has a fluid, abstract and ergonomic design.

results.title: Lapalma Cross
results.description: With its attractive and fluid profile, appearing to almost take off, CROSS is what its name promises, a passage, a crossing. The body rests and thoughts remain active. Also and especially when a thought involves circular ecology. All parts of the structure of this stool, made of metal and polyurethane, rigid on the inside and soft on the outside, are recyclable.

results.title: Lapalma Giro
results.description: Light, dynamic and with industrial appeal: GIRO is a stool with the perfect backrest for getting noticed in bars, restaurants, hotels and even in the home.

results.title: Lapalma Glove
results.description: News 2022. For information go tolapalma website

results.title: Lapalma Lem
results.description: Slender and height-adjustable, LEM is the iconic stool par excellence. In an entirely painted version, its functional structure combines with the formal elegance of black or white.

results.title: Lapalma Link
results.description: At a counter or at a bar, in a kitchen, a restaurant or a hotel, the LINK bar stool, H. 75 cm, has a unique seat comprising two side by side wing elements, highlighting the lightness of its structure.

results.title: Lapalma Mak
results.description: With its light design and its innovative lines, MAK is very much a modern stool for those who love experimenting with style, without forgoing functionality.

results.title: Lapalma Miunn
results.description: The utmost comfort with a contemporary look: the height-adjustable MIUNN stool with a round base adapts to different types of tables and tops, becoming a versatile and key feature for furnishing contexts.

results.title: Lapalma Ryo
results.description: RYO, designed for an extremely free and dynamic use, provides natural light support thanks to its round base supporting an element without a backrest.

results.title: laCividina Velour
results.description: The Velour collection becomes even more effective and impactful for the design of contract, office and residential spaces, thanks to the new elements chair, small armchair, lounge armchair and barstool. A concrete answer and excellent comfort for every destination.

results.title: Lapalma Wil
results.description: Freely inspired by the automotive sector, with stitching on the seat that resembles a steering wheel and a unique 3-leg base, the height-adjustable WIL stool is a truly innovative furnishing item.

results.title: laCividina Bennett
results.description: Comfort and visual appeal with a light spirit and complex volumes.

results.title: Lapalma Cut
results.description: Thanks to its technical yet trendy swivel aluminium base, the CUT chair looks to the future. Ideal for offices and work environments, it has a sophisticated design that also embellishes the home.

results.title: Lapalma Edit
results.description: A versatile presence combines Nordic minimalism with Italian softness while perfectly blending in with spaces in the home, such as kitchens and living rooms, but also with contract spaces, from offices to hotels. With its sculptural shape, EDIT is easy to disassemble and can be entirely recycled.

results.title: Lapalma Fedra
results.description: FEDRA expresses the perfect combination of lightness and sturdiness in its Danish-style design. The metal base blends with a rounded backrest, which can be customised in various fabrics and colours to create a surprising effect.

results.title: Campeggi Lazy Basketball
results.description: For basketball lovers but not only: Lazy Basketball is a metal structure chair with a back made of synthetic net. It has a simple and winding shape which ends with a real bang: a funny colorful basket.

results.title: Lapalma Oiva
results.description: âOIVAâ means âsomething goodâ. And goodness can be found, first and foremost, in its classic lines, made more contemporary, minimalist and light. The goodness, above all, lies in wood as the raw material, which is recyclable ash plywood, originating from FSC-certified forests. Wood is used for the frame, the wide, enveloping backrest in bent plywood, and the seat, also bent, which can be padded and upholstered in fabric on request. Lightweight, stackable and ideal for the kitchen or living room, OIVA brings homely warmth to all public spaces.

results.title: Lapalma Seela
results.description: Slide-frame legs and a minimalist profile: the light stackable SEELA chair allows many options for customising, as it easily adapts to any context.

results.title: LaCividina She's
results.description: Sheâs rests on slender legs and supple feet. Clear boundaries have been rejected in the design of this chair, whose compact size brings out the best of its surroundings.

results.title: Lapalma Stil
results.description: STIL, with its simple lines, made entirely of painted metal and inspired by iconic bistrot chairs, hides highly refined details, such as concealed couplings and a truly comfortable curved back.

results.description: A range of 63 elements that can be freely face-to-face arrangements.

results.title: LaCividina Velour
results.description: The Velour collection becomes even more effective and impactful for the design of contract, office and residential spaces, thanks to the new elements chair, small armchair, lounge armchair and barstool. A concrete answer and excellent comfort for every destination.

results.title: Lapalma Brunch
results.description: Is it a table or a peninsula element? You can choose because BRUNCH has been designed with a unique top that becomes a leg on one side for maximum versatility.

results.title: Dieffebi DotBox Meeting
results.description: DotBox Evolution is a series of various sized tables, which can be used independently or in combination with the Dieffebi DotBox containers collection, in order to create fully customized workstations. results.description: DotBox Evolution is a series of various sized tables, which can be used independently or in combination with the Dieffebi DotBox containers collection, in order to create fully customized workstations. results.description: Folding table that works in many different areas when flexibility is needed.Top in melamine with ABS edge and structure in aluminum, reclinable table.

results.title: Lapalma Fork
results.description: The FORK table features innovative dimensions and modern design. It has a highly functional round top and legs inspired by the branches of a tree. It is ideal in the home, in bars or in offices.

results.title: Lapalma Frame
results.description: A combination of quality materials, minimalist design and timeless aesthetic appeal results in FRAME, the table that becomes the ideal solution for all needs.

results.title: Lapalma Jey
results.description: Marble or cement provide a striking base that contrasts with a light top. JEY is an innovative and versatile small designer table, with a handle detail that makes it easy to move.

results.title: laCividina Keisho
results.description: Keisho is another creation that is inspired by natural and organic forms. Originally conceived to complement the Suiseki collection, this table has developed into the ideal accessory for all LaCividina sofas. Light and easy to move, Keisho can be positioned next to any part of a sofa, making it an unbeatable practical solution for both the contract market and household use.

results.title: laCividina Mil
results.description: A combination of four basic elements, three refined materials and two sophisticated colours. The solid concept behind this coffee table underlines the understated forms and the inherent qualities of wood, glass and marble. Exquisite customization options are available.

results.title: laCividina Molecule
results.description: The seat acts like a central atom, with round coffee tables and poufs attached to it.

results.title: laCividina ScancarÃ²
results.description: The distinctive feature of this line of coffee tables is highlighted by its name, which means âit bentâ in Sicilian.

results.title: Lapalma Ori
results.description: A large perfect square that can be fitted with an electrified system if required. In the high square table version, the ORI table has a strong and decisive character, ideal for hosting meetings and group work. Everyone can find space for their own ideas and work around the top, whereas the electrified top version allows everybody to get connected. The slanted leg, which hides cables and a power supply in a secret gap, created where the wood and steel join, can be fixed in two different positions, reducing overall dimensions where necessary.

results.title: Lapalma Panco
results.description: A straight line and a distinct corner. PANCO is a versatile table that is ideal for organising, sharing and making different types of environments functional, from offices to trendy bars.

results.title: Lapalma Rondo
results.description: The key word is: minimalism. The simple yet harmonious RONDÃ table is a highly versatile furnishing item, which allows you to furnish home spaces, work environments, bars and restaurants etc. with a sophisticated touch.

results.title: Lapalma Seltz
results.description: Sturdy feet, a slender base and a tiltable top. SELTZ, the folding round bar table, is space-saving and easily adapts to contexts that require a high degree of versatility.

results.title: Dieffebi T-Share
results.description: T-share system comprises a family of tables in various dimensions, with heights of 74cm and 105cm. The worktop is available in several finishes and widths. With depths of 90 cm and 130 cm it makes space sharing easy. Standard top in 20 mm thick chipboard, with various surface finishes. The system structure and legs are in painted metal.

results.title: laCividina Turi Turi
results.description: The traditional flat caps worn by Sicilian men inspired the elegant top of this coffee table, which is combined with a base with soft, light lines and thus brings together Sicilian Baroque art and minimal style.

results.title: laCividina U
results.description: U is a collection of tables of various heights and sizes that can be used individually or as part of a set. Its comes in three shapes: square or rectangular with rounded corners, and circular. There are two versions: 100% metal or metal and wood. The sculpturesque style with minimalist lines means that the U collection is ideal for both the contract market and private homes.

results.title: laCividina Up
results.description: An essential coffee table whose personality changes with the materials chosen. Vintage flavours and timeless elegance prevail when the veins of marble are on display, while the wooden versions are steeped in dynamic modernity.

results.title: Lapalma Yo
results.description: YO is a very stylish designer side table, ideal for complementing a living room, a relaxation area or a lounge.

Frames are made of a powder coated aluminum frame and come in two colors; light grey or dark grey. The cushions are made from outdoor fabrics filled with Quickdry foam and come in three different fabrics; Light Grey Sunbrella Sling, Beige Linen Nelen & Delbeke and Light Grey Sunbrella Ash.

The armchair has rounded edges and soft shapes. It can be used outside all year round and will become a beautiful silver gray over the years. Its’ armrests are wide enough to host a wine glass,  a nut bowl or a book.

results.title: Skargaarden Brand Book
results.description: For the first time since starting Skargaarden in 2008 we have produced a brand book. Presenting memorable and distinctive environments from our photoshoots and most importantly presenting our quality outdoor furniture on display in these amazing environments.

results.title: BAMSE
results.description: Bamse är en bekväm soffa med mjuka linjer. Ryggen har lodräta stickningar med ett bra stabilt ryggstöd. Sittdynan är lös och levereras med lösa armstödsöverdrag. Denna tidlösa soffa gör sig fin i de flesta utrymmen, men kanske lite extra snygg i just ditt vardagsrum!

results.title: CAPRI SOFFA
results.description: Soffan i en möbelserie med klassisk design där enkelhet och komfort utgör grunden. De rostfria detaljerna ger soffan ett exklusivt och modernt utseende samtidigt som den är mjuk och välkomnande. Capri-serien består av många modellvarianter, inklusive fåtölj och dagbädd samt soffor i storlekarna 2.5, 3, eller 3.5-sits, med A eller B armstöd. En perfekt soffa för vardagsrum i alla storlekar!

results.title: OLÈ
results.description: Olé är en modulsoffa som både är modern och klassisk. Detta är en byggbar modulsoffa, som gör den anpassningsbar till önskemål. Den har rena linjer och en organisk form, vilket gör den fin både in till väggen samt i ett öppet utrymme. De minimalistiska benen gör så att soffan trots sitt djup och volym, framstår som vacker och elegant. Helt enkelt en soffa som passar in i alla lägen.

results.title: CAPRI SOFFA
results.description: Soffan i en möbelserie med klassisk design där enkelhet och komfort utgör grunden. De rostfria detaljerna ger soffan ett exklusivt och modernt utseende samtidigt som den är mjuk och välkomnande. Capri-serien består av många modellvarianter, inklusive fåtölj och dagbädd samt soffor i storlekarna 2.5, 3, eller 3.5-sits, med A eller B armstöd. En perfekt soffa för vardagsrum i alla storlekar!

results.title: CAPRI DAGBÄDD
results.description: Dagbädden är en del av en möbelserie med klassisk design där enkelhet och komfort utgör grunden. Med de enkla men klassiska rostfria benen kommer Capri dagbädd aldrig att gå ur stil. Den stilfulla ramen gör dagbädden både slitstark och visuellt tilltalande. Tillval är Capri dagbädd huvudkudde för extra komfort.

results.title: BAMSE
results.description: Bamse är en bekväm fåtölj med ett stabilt ryggstöd och den tidlösa fåtöljen är ett fint tillskott till ditt vardagsrum eller i en läshörna. Armskydden som ingår skyddar fåtöljens känsligaste punkt vilket ger fåtöljen ännu längre livstid. Bamse är väldigt populär i norden men den är även uppskattad utomlands, även av Barack Obama som precis suttit i den.

results.title: TEDDY
results.description: Teddy är en utav våra mindre vilfåtöljer som kan placeras i de flesta utrymmen utan att ta för mycket plats. Ensam gör den sig till exempel fin vid ett skrivbord eller i en läshörna. Med en soffa blir den ett perfekt komplement då den tar inte mycket plats i rummet; men den utstrålar både värme och atmosfär.

results.title: MODENA
results.description: Modena är en otroligt bekväm fåtölj som både är snurrbar och fällbar. När du lutar dig tillbaka i stolen så fälls ryggen ner och fotstödet upp – för maximal komfort. Nackstödet är dessutom ställbart framåt-bakåt. Vilostolen kan väljas som manuell eller med motor, men båda erbjuder dig att låsa stolen i vilket läge du än vill.

results.title: SHELTER
results.description: Shelter är en otroligt bekväm vilstol, som även är snurrbar med integrerad fotpall. Fåtöljen har två motorer för individuell justering av rygg/sits och fotstöd. Detta möjliggör en separat fällning för sits samt fotpall, allt för att maximera din komfort!

results.title: HOOP
results.description:
Hoop är en nätt snurrfåtölj av dansk design med hög komfort. En spännande modell
som kan beställas i tyg, konstläder eller skinn. Detta kan kombineras med trästomme i flera färgvarianter samt kryssfot i blank, borstat eller svart krom ger dig flertalet möjligheter, allt för att det ska passa ditt hem bäst!

results.title: COSMOS
results.description: Cosmos har en helt unik komfort tack vare den steglösa ryggjustering, vilket gör att du kan skapa den perfekta sittställningen. Just därför är Cosmos den perfekt stolen för att läsa och koppla av framför tv:n. Utöver sin unika komfort har Cosmos en distinkt design som kombinerar det klassiska uttrycket med det moderna. Cosmos passar därför in i varje hem och kan vara möbeln som lyser upp vardagsrummet.

results.title: CAPRI Fåtölj
results.description: En fåtölj i en möbelserie med klassisk design där enkelhet och komfort utgör grunden. De rostfria detaljerna ger fåtöljen ett exklusivt och modernt utseende. Serien består av många modellvarianter, en komplett soffgrupp för kunder inom kontor & konferens, hotell och lounge.

results.title: CAPRI Fåtölj

results.title: EPIC BODY
results.description: Epic Body är en bekväm matsalsstol som är designad av Henrik Lehm för Lehm collection, men med flexibilitet i åtanke så att den ska passa ditt hem. Detta görs genom att du kan välja flera av stolens komponenter, såsom färg, armstöd och sitsskal. För att den ska passa dig perfekt kan du välja på en stomme i massiv ek, svart ek eller valnöt, men du kan även på den helt klädd i skinn eller tyg. Epic Body passar in i många olika miljöer och är mycket bekväm tack vare den kroppsformade sitsen och ryggen.

results.title: EPIC SLIM
results.description: LEHM collection, som är designad av Henrik Lehm, bygger på att det ska finnas valmöjligheter för att anpassa stolen utefter behov. Epic Slim är en nätt stol, men som kan anpassas efter sitt ändamål. Detta genom olika val såsom färg, armstöd och sittskal. För att den ska passa dig perfekt kan du välja på en stomme i massiv ek, svart ek eller valnöt, men du kan även få den helt klädd i skinn eller tyg. Även armstöden ger dig 8 olika valmöjligheter, allt för att stolen ska passa in i den miljön du önskar. Benen har även en del valmöjligheter, så som med eller utan hjul, ben i rostfritt eller svart metall.

results.title: EPIC ARA
results.description: Vi spenderar många timmar sittandes i våra möbler, därför måste de vara bekväma och ge bra stöd för kroppen samtidigt som de är estetiskt tilltalande. Epic Ara, designad av Henrik Lehm uppfyller ovanstående då den har komfort och design i högsta fokus. Designen talar för sig själv men komforten är inte lika enkel att se. Egenskaper så som snurr, retur och/eller vipp funktionen gör dock att den garanteras. Epic Ara är helklädd, men du kan 4 knappar som tillägg i ryggen. Likaså har benen även en del valmöjligheter, så som med eller utan hjul, ben i rostfritt eller svart metall. Med LEHM collection vill vi att du ska ha många valmöjligheter med möjlighet att designa en stol perfekt för dig.

results.title: SPIKE BODY
results.description: Spike-sortimentet fokuserar på hållbarhet, mycket med hjälp av användningen av naturmaterial; trä, linoleum och återanvändbara material. Detta ger ett uttryck för vår omtanke om miljön, samtidigt som den gör produkterna anpassningsbara. Spike-Body har till exempel tunna hylsor i massivt trä som kan sättas dit på Spike-stolens metallben om man i stället önskar ben i träutförande för en varmare look. De finns i lackerad ek, svart ek eller valnöt. Med dessa hylsor kan man därigenom enkelt ändra utförandet hos Spike-Bodys ben – hållbart för miljö och ekonomi. Spike Body har även andra anpassligheter, så som hjul för att anpassa stolen till en kontorsmiljö, eller 4 olika armstöd för att utveckla designen ytterligare. Även sittskalen har flera valmöjligheter – ek, valnöt eller svart ek; helt i trä, med stoppad sits eller helklädda. Skummet som används i Spike Body är brandhämmande CMHR-skum.

results.title: SPIKE SLIM
results.description: Möblerna i LEHM-kollektionen har harmoniska proportioner och en design som kombinerar skönhet och stilrenhet, Spike Slim är inte ett undantag. Stolens nätta form gör att den passar in i flera olika miljöer, likaså möjligheten att modifiera designen utefter behov. Exempelvis har sittskalen flera valmöjligheter – ek, valnöt eller svart ek; helt i trä, med stoppad sits eller helklädda. Stolen kan även fås med eller utan hjul, och kunden har 6 olika armstöd att välja på. Sitsen kan även beställas med sömnad i sits och tyg.

results.title: SPIKE ARA
results.description: Spike Ara är en elegant och bekväm stol som gör sig lika bra runt matbordet som i läshörnan. Matstolen är designad av och formgiven av Henrik Lehm och säljs idag över hela världen. Sitsen är stoppad och klädd för att vara skön att sitta i flera timmar. Stolen underrede är tillverkat i svart stål, men kan även fås med trä-cylindrar som täcker stålet och ger stolen en varmare look. Stolen kan beställas i flera olika färger på sitsen, i både tyg och skinn, hos din närmsta återförsäljare.

results.title: SPIKE BAR ARA
results.description: Spike bar-seriens stolar kommer i två höjder, 104 respektive 114 cm. Spike Bar Ara ger möjligheter till en industriell look, eller en varmare look – tack vare valmöjligheterna på underredet. Underredena finns i svart metall, lackerad ek, svart ek eller lackerad valnöt. Observera att ringen i underredet alltid är i svart metall. Även sitsskalet bjuder på flexibel design, med val som med eller utan knappar i ryggen. Det stora antalet kombinationsmöjligheterna ger många olika utseende, allt för en perfekt stol i den efterfrågade miljön. Skummet som används i Spike Bar Ara är brandhämmande CMHR-skum.

results.title: SPIKE BAR BODY
results.description: Spike Bar Body är en av barstolarna från Lehm collection, forgiven av Henrik Lehm.  Barstolen utstrålar design och komfort som även är tydliga karaktäristiska drag genom hela Lehm serien. Ryggstödet till barstolen Body är formgivet för att följa människans naturliga former för att ge dig maximalt med komfort, samtidigt som det ger ett elegant intryck.

results.title: SPIKE BAR BODY
results.description: Spike Bar Body är en av barstolarna från Lehm collection, forgiven av Henrik Lehm.  Barstolen utstrålar design och komfort som även är tydliga karaktäristiska drag genom hela Lehm serien. Ryggstödet till barstolen Body är formgivet för att följa människans naturliga former för att ge dig maximalt med komfort, samtidigt som det ger ett elegant intryck.

results.title: SPIKE BAR SLIM
results.description: Spike Bar Slim är en enkel och tidlös barstol som kommer i två höjder, 104 respektive 114cm. Stolen kan anpassas utefter behov eller stil, sitsskalet kan exempelvis beställas i ek, svart ek eller valnöt; helt i trä, med stoppad sits eller helklädd. Önskas stolen helklädd kan sömnad i sits och rygg beställas till. Spike Bar Slim har även 3 olika typer av armstöd att välja mellan, i 3 olika utförande. Underredet har alltid svart metall som grund, men kan även fås med tunna hylsor i trä över, för ett lite varmare utseende. Även dessa kan fås i ek, valnöt eller svart ek. Likt de andra barstolarna kan Spike Bar Mini även beställas med funktion, antingen med retur eller 360-rotation.

results.title: STEP BODY
results.description: Step Body är en stilren stol med en organisk form och ett klassiskt underrede. Dock är STEP-serien unik i det att den är en traditionell fyrbent stol med funktioner. Den, likt övrigt LEHM-sortiment kan beställas med retur, 360-rotation och/eller vipp. Step Body har ett sitsskal som kan anpassas utefter den tilltänka miljöns behov, det kan beställas i ek, svart ek eller valnöt; helt i trä, med stoppad sits eller helklädd. Även när det kommer till armstöden så finns det 2 olika alternativ i 2 olika färger att välja mellan. Underredet är däremot alltid i svart metall, med möjlighet att lägga till hjul för att anpassa stolen till kontorsmiljöer. Stolen är även stapelbar för att underlätta förvaring av stolen. Finns det behovet kan en specialproducerad platta beställas för att skydda sitsskalet mot underredet. Skummet som används i Step Body är brandhämmande CMHR-skum.

results.title: STEP SLIM
results.description: Step Slim gör sig utmärkt såväl i en restaurang som en möteslokal och kontor. Eftersom den är en del av LEHM-konceptet så kan den beställas med funktioner så som retur, 360-snurr och/eller vipp. Stolen är ergonomiskt utformad för att passa längre sittstunder.

results.title: STEP ARA
results.description: Step Ara är är en stol med en spinn på den traditionella fyrbenta stolen. Det är en helklädd stol för maximal komfort, där knappar i ryggen kan läggas till vid önskemål. Underredet är alltid i svart metall, med möjlighet att lägga till hjul för att anpassa stolen till ett hemmakontor.

results.title: RUN SLIM
results.description: Run Slim är gjord för att skapa enkelhet i vardagen. Stolens armstöd gör så att den kan hängas på ett bord, vilket underlättar för dammsugning och annan rengöring.

results.title: RUN BODY
results.description: Run-familjen är unik i LEHM-konceptet eftersom den är framtagen för att passa hos dig som vill kunna dammsuga med enkelhet. Stolens armstöd gör så att den kan hängas på ett bord, vilket underlättar för dammsugning eller torkning av golv.

results.title: EPIC MATBORD
results.description: Ett elegant matbord som likaså kan användas som skrivbord vid behov. Detta är mycket tack vare det stora utbudet av olika bordsskivor som finns. Bordets ben har samma utformning som tillhörande stolar i Epic-serien, men självklart passar även andra stolar från LEHM kollektionen utmärkt med bordet.

results.title: EPIC SOFFBORD
results.description: Soffbordet Epic är ett nätt och enkelt bord, designat av Henrik Lehm. Tack vare den eleganta designen är det enkelt att kombineras med vårt övriga sortiment eller med möblerna i ditt hem. Det passar in i många olika miljöer tack vare sitt minimalistiska uttryck. Bordsskivan gör designmöjligheterna stora, med flera olika kulörer i faner, laminat eller linoleum.

results.title: SPIKE BARBORD
results.description: Det är barbordet har harmoniska proportioner och en design som kombinerar skönhet och stilrenhet. Genom grafiskt framträdande stödstrukturer, som detaljerna i benen, förstärks den visuella upplevelsen. Helhetsprofilen ger uttryck för klassisk tidlöshet. Bordets ben har samma utformning som tillhörande stolar i Spike-serien.

results.title: SPIKE MATBORD
results.description: Ett stilrent bord som passar i ditt kök eller i ditt hemmakontor. Detta är på grund ut av det stora utbudet av olika bordsskivor som finns. Bordets ben har samma utformning som tillhörande stolar i Spike-serien, men självklart passar även andra stolar från LEHM kollektionen utmärkt till bordet.

results.title: SPIKE SOFFBORD
results.description: Soffbordet Spike är ett nätt och enkelt bord som enkelt kan kombineras med vårt övriga sortiment. Det passar in i många olika miljöer tack vare sitt minimalistiska uttryck.

results.title: SPIKE UTDRAGSBORD
results.description: Ett bord av högsta kvalité med smidig utdragsfunktion och iläggsskiva. Iläggsskivan ligger dold under bordet för att göra det så enkelt som möjligt när den behövs. Dra helt enkelt ut bordsskivorna för att få fram iläggsskivorna.

results.title: Dieffebi Tower
results.description: Vertical File is the ideal solution to optimize and share archiving space, with a system that easily integrates with any workstation. The modules are arranged vertically and can also be used as separators between two desks. Vertical File elements can be complemented by additional superimposed modules, with a small shutter closure or left open, to meet any storage need in a personalized manner.
